bo stong la rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i spyi ba'i nags gser gyis nyo ba'i mdzes par gyur pa yin no// dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ud ta ra
man+da ra'i ri da las rgal bar gyur nas rdo sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chu bo yod de/ chu dar ni rtswa'i rigs dang shing gi rigs su gyur pa 'am/ sams can gyi rigs su gyur
la ba'am/ ri dwags dang bya'i rigs su gyur pa rnams kyang rung ste/ gang cung zadaltung bar gyur pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// chu bo de'i sa
zla gnyis dag nakI tsakA zhes bya ba'i 'od mi de dag rnams rludags
der 'dor bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dag slong phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ 'dzam bu gling las rid du 'das par gyur nas ri'i
rigs sam/ chu klung gi rigs gzhan dgan ci zhi no/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'imig gis mthong ba' gyur pa saM ta zhes bya ba'i chu bo yod pa ni rgyur ni
dpag tshad bcu yin la/ ring bar gyur pa'i dngos por ni dpag tshad sum brgya yin no// des sems can gyi rigs gang dag lhung bar gyur ba rnams ni rtsu ba par gyur pa'i sku yin pas/
de dag rnams thams cad kyang grang ba'i dngos pos rnam par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de la ni 'ga' zhig kyang bya bar mi nus so// chu klung de las 'das par gyur nas 'dzam bu'i
gling gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gling yod do// de la rtag tu rgyags pa zhes bya ba'i dri blo rab tu gnas pa yin te/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi bsgrubs par gyur ba/ tshul khrims
dang yang dag par ldan pas rtag tu draga' ba myur du song ba/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnams thams cad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// gling thugs nyid kyang ljon shing thams cad kyis nyo bar
mdzes par byas pa sta/ gsar gyi rang bzhin gyi ljon shing rnams so// pad+ma rnams kyang be cha ma'i sdong bu can gyi pad+ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o// gling 'di nas ri
rab lhun po yang rung yang ring ba ma yin no// de'i dbang gis ri dang/ bya dang/ chu bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad nyid kyang gsar du mthong bar 'gyur ro// ut+pal dang ku mu da cha
kyang phun sum tshogs pa yin no// gling 'di na ni btung ba'i chu klung dang rnams kyang thams cad las rab tu 'bab pa'o// 'bras shA li rnams kyang ma byas par rnyed par 'gyur ro// gling
@#// de yang dpag tshad nyis stong pa yin no// da las 'das pa ru gyur nas ri dang/ chu klung dang/ shing rnams ni namamakha' bzhin te/ rgya mtshodapag tshad sum brgya
lbu bas kun tu gang ba yin no// rgya mtsho dun glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba dang rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa'i klu mang po gnas so sor gnas so// de las ring du 'dus nas mig btsums pa zhes
ts+tshA bya ba'i 'a yod do// de lasamchog tu mdzes par gyur pa'i mig btsums pa'i phug ces bya ba yod do// phug du yang nyamo'i cha la ni de nas rdzus te skye ba'i bud med rnams legs par skya
tsha ste mchog tu lang tsho phun sum tshogs par gyur/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis mdzes par byas pa'o// de ni nyin zhag gcig 'tsho ba yin te/ gang gi tsho la 'char bar gyur ba de'i tshe do/
tha rnams rgas 'khogs par gyur nas 'chibar 'gyur te/ srog gcod pa'i rgyu ba thun pa las yin no// mig btsum pa'i phug bde ri de las ring du 'das pa na yang zla ba'i ri bo zhes bya ba'i
kha/sar gyi mdog tu gyur pa dpag tshad ldabargya ba yin no// ri bo ri rab lhun po la 'gran pa zhesabya ba'i ri dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa yin te/ de'i byang phyogs logs la ke ta ka'i nags yod
pa[u0f10 ]de lani rmi lamaM mthong ba'i bgegs zhes bya ba srin mo rab tu gnas ba yin te/ bang shin tu mgyogs par gyur pas mig btsum tsam la yang dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang po rnams su
'gro bar byed de/ desazhi skyes bu dag la don yod pa dang/ mi bde ba dang/ mi phan pa rnams byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor stod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjesasu lta zhing ga'u/
te/ gzhan ni byang phyogs sgram snyan pa dang 'dzam bu gling pa'i bar nari'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ chu klung gi rigs su gyur pa 'tsho/ rgya mtsho'i rigs su gyur pa ni gzhan gang dag yod/
cing gang la yang bdag cag skyes par ma gyur pa 'am/ na bar ma gyur pa 'am/ 'chi'i pho bar ma gyur pa 'am/ skyo bar ma gyur pa 'am/ las kyi bar 'gro ba ma yin par ma gyur

pa rnams sam/ sdug pa dang yod u0f74 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang yang tha dad du gyur pa bya ba dang bral ba dang/ rnam par bral ba dang ldan par ma gyur pa yod dmazhen/ da ni sanama'i tshad tsam gyi
yul gcig kyang ma mthong ngo// gang la 'thun pa yid du 'ong bar gyur pa rnams thams cad dang tha dad du gyur pa dang/ rnam par zhag pa dang/ rnam par gyes pa dang/ rnam par bral ba dang
ldan par ma gyur pa'i mad do// de'i phyir na rong ba ring bar 'du byed thams cad las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyi/ rnam par grol bar gyis/ skyo ba med par gyur ta re/ 'khor ba la
kun tu chags par gyur pa skyes par gyur ta ra/ srid pa'i zhags pa'i dbang du kun nas 'gro bar ma byed cig/ 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar ma byed cig/ 'khor ba 'din reb tu 'bar
bdang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ yongs su dal ba yin no// mi mthun par gyur pa rnams dang phrad pa dang/ 'thun pa rnams dang bral bar
la 'gyur ba'i ma dag gi dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams su'o// mi dang lha'i gnas su bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur ba rnams ni g.yo ba ma yin la/ bde ba ma len
yang gti mug gis kun nas g.yogs pa yabu no// de'i phyi'in thams cud la yang skyo ba skyo bar gyis shig/ da 'khor bar 'khor bar ma byed dang/ bdud kyi yul la gnas par
( gyur ta ra/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cigatu rtsa bar ma byed dang/ phyis 'gyod pa skyed par 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus l
rgyusu lta zhing gnas pa rnams ni bdud kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'du byed rnams thams cad la yang chags pa 'dral
ba dang nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par song ba dang/ las kyi mtha' rnams dang bral ba dang/ bya rtsol dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor sbyong ba phyi rol gyi lus
kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas ti/ sgra mi snyan pa dang 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i byang gi phyob/san pa'i 'gas su gyur pa 'am/ chu bo'i rigs su gyur pa gzhan dag yod dam ze
na/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gisamathong bar gyur pa khu byug gis gang ba'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ri bo phangs su ni dpag tshad sum cu ba sta/
rgyar ni dpag tshadabacu pa yin no// ri de la ni khu byug brgya phrag mang pos kun tu khang ba 'gyur pa// shing mya ngan med sngon po dang/ mya ngan mad dmar po dang/ 'dab ma bdun pa dang
ko dA la dang/ ka dam pa dang/ a sho ka le brganadang/ ma tog 'brang ba gsar ba dang/ so'u bar na yu shAkang dang/ su ma na dang/ shAlam la dang/ ta la pu yang dong/
dgu ku ta skyes dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ kun da dung/ ban+d+ha dza ba kadang/ dbyar gyi dus pa dang rnams te/ ji ltar nam zla dang dus tshod kyi rjes su 'dug par byed pa'i ma tog rnams hUM
ri de la kun tu gang ba yin na/ 'phreng ba thogs pa zhes bya ba'i lha ras 'ga' rang gi gnas ri rab lhun po btang nas de la rtswa dga' ba'abyed do// ri de ni dga' ba yin pa'i phyir yang glu dang/
gar dang/ rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis kyang ri de la yid dga' ba byed do// 'on kyang lha de dag rnams kyi sems kun nasagayang bas rnam par g.yong bar mi 'gyur ro// khu byug gis gang
bar gyur pa'i ri de las 'das par gyur nas dang pa'i nags zhes bya ba rgya mtsho'i yul phyogs nas yod de/ ngang pa brgya stong phrag rnams khyus rgyu bar byed do// nyo 'khor rnams da na
pad+ma rnams kyis kyang gang ba yin zhing/ rgya mtsho' da'i sa phyogs rnamasalabya ka ran Ta pa dang/ tsakrakhA ka dang/ ka dam ba dang/ rnam nor bu'i chu dang/ yul
'jam po'i mal pa can la sogs pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur pa dang/ gsara'abar ba'i mdog lta bu'i pad+ma rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur pas dpag tshad stong phrag bcu'is khyogs khyab
par gyur to// nye 'khor gzhan las 'das par gyur nas ri rab lhun po'i byang gi cha'i rgyu mtsho'i khor yug dpag tshad brgya phrag bcur nya dang/ nyachen po dang/ chu srin na kra dang/ chu srin ma na
ra dang ! chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ rus sbala rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur pa yin no// nya'akhor kun yang kha dog nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i chu sngon po yin te
'bas su ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu yin no// don yang mo dung rnams gnas te/ bdag nyid kyi dngos po'i tshadan rgyang grugs tsam yin no// stobs chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin te/
chu'i nang na gang dag gnas pa'i rtse mo dudag rnams shugs kyis bsgulanas ltung bar byed do// glang po che stobs kyi stobs re ra 'dzan pa yin no/ de las ring du 'das nas 'o ma'i chu zhes
bya ba'i rgya mtsho[%]'khor du dpag tshad stong phrag lnga yod pa sta/ rtag tu rlabs rnams kyis dkrug par byed pa// rtag tu sprin dang sgra sgrog par byed pa'ishin tu khro bar gyur pa'i klu dug can
) rnams kyis gang bar gyur ba yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang phyogs ngosan ri'i rigs sam/ chu
bo'i rigs sam/ rgya mtsho rigs gzhan gang dag yin na/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa/ gsar dang/ gsar dmar
po dang she la gyi rang bzhin gyi ri rgya phrag lta yod pas/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i gling de nang bar gyi nyima'i mdog dang 'drab dang/ bad+ma dang/ bad+ma'i sdod bu dag gis kyang gang ba
gyur pa sta/ yul de ni dpag tshad sum stod yin no// yul de las 'das par gyur nas/ sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam bu'i gling dag gi phyogs ngos la/ 'o ma dang mtshungs par 'jug pa zhes
bya ba'i yul rnam par bkra bar gyur pa'i ri dang/ nags dang/ rta ba'i nags dang/ ri dag dang khyu yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang rnams kyis kun gang bar gyur pa dang/ rtag tu dga'
bar gyur pa'i lha gsang ba ba rnams kyis gang bar gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ljon shing dang/ ma tog gi tshogs kyi kun nas dud par gyur pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur pa/ nyo'akhor
nyams ga' ba yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi la gyi lus la lus kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang gi sgram snyan pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang ngos na/ ra' ro//

(/ grong khyer bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi rnam pa rnams kyi chu 'khor rnams kun tu gang bar gyur pa ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang bskal pa gzhan rnams la yod dag 'a ba yin no// shad
rus pa dang/ chusar rnams brol bar gyur pa ma gtogs bar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lho rnams kyi drunganani/ 'jig pa med pa yang yin no// lha rnams ni mag mi 'dzums pa yin la/
byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnamasani pags pa dang/ sha dang/ rus pa dang/ chu sor dang/ mag 'dzum par byed pa dang bcas pa yin zhing/ bdag gi ba med pa dang/ nga rgyal yang
med pa yin te/ shi nas kyang nges par lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba yin no// sgyu dang/ g.yo dang/ phrag go dang/ khongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur pa dang/ rtag par rab tu
dga' bar gyur pa yin no// srin mo dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ sang ga dang/ stag dang/ gung dang/ spyang ki dang/ glu dang/ lto ba phyi dang/ sbrul gdengs ka can dang/
[s mu ga dang/ chod pa dang/ grang ba dang/ ltegs pa dang/ sgog pa dang/ nad dang/ lhas char mi 'babs par gyur pa rnams dang bral ba dang/ ban tshun kun dga' bar byed
pa rnams yin no// dedag rnams la 'jigs pa ru gyur pa rgyal po dang/ chom rkun dang/ chu drang/ ma drang/ mtshon cha 'bab pas 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyang med pa/
yanuno nyan mo dngamtshanamo'i khyad par yang red pa ma yin te/ gsar gyi rang bzhin gyi ljon shing rnams kyi 'od zer kun tu 'phro ba'i phyir ro// de la ljon shing rnams ni hari
mya'i rang bzhin dang/ gsur dang/ dmar po byi ru dang/ dngul gyi rang bzhin rnams yin no// bya rnam par rgyu ba rnam pa sna tshogs par rnams byed pa dang kun nas ras par
gyur bani rab tu dga' ba'i skyug bu rnams bzhin no// shing de dag rnams kyisogs dad ldan pa bzhin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing
gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling na dga' b yod pa dang/ dga' ba las kyang shin tu dga' ba yod pa gzhan gang yin na/ das thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/
lha'i mag gis mthong bar gyur pa byang phyogs sgra mi snyanagyi glingan ri chen po bcu yodado// 'di lta ste/ sang sha kazhes bya ba'i ri dang/ rwa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ri dang/ ri dag
kyi sgra dul ba zhes bya ba'i ri dang/ sprin dkar bo 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ri dang/ mtho ba brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ri dang/ 'thung ba'i nye 'khor zhes bya ba'i
dang dusan dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ridwang/ kun dga' ba 'dzin pa zhesabya ba'i ri dang/ yad kyis rjes su 'thuzhu ba zhes bya ba'i ri dang/ pad+makug sha ya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
ri dang sta/ ri chen po bcu bo de dag gis byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa yongasasu bskor ba yin no// dpar na 'dzam bu'i gling 'a bzhis yongs su bskor ba yin
te/ gangs can dang/ 'bagos byed dang/ ma la ya dang/ ti sa'o// de kho na bzhin du ra bcus byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling yongs su bskor ba yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor
spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ ri de dag rnams la ma tog dang/ 'khrishing/ tshogs 'khrilapadang/ mtsho dang/ chu klung dang/ bya dang/ 'bras bu
myudang/ ri dgas kyi rigs ni yod pa rnams des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sang ka sha'i ri la sang kasha zhes bya ba'i ljon shing dus drug
tu ma tog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ljon shing da ngag rnams la nyin mtshan du'ang 'od 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mtshan mo'i skar ma rnams bzhin no// dri yang dabag chod du rab tu
ma// byung ba yin te/ ji ltar cung zadacig kyang 'dzam bu'i sungan cha 'dra ba ni med do// sad ka sha'i ri de la nags lnga yod pa rnams ni 'di lta ste/ grib ma sngon po zhes bya ba'i nags dang/
bya nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i nags dang/ zab mo zhes bya ba'i nagasadang/ sprin dkar po zhes bya ba'i nags dang/ rnam par 'bar ba zhes byaba'i nags dang rnamasaso// da la sang
kasha'i ri de las sngon dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i ma tog rnams rgyas pa'i phyiran/ 'di ni nam mkhar dang mtshungs pa yin no// des na 'di nisang ka na'i razhis bya'o// de la phyogasagacig
na gribam sngon po zhes bya ba'i nags yod de/ de la gang cung zad dkar po gyur pa'i ga blugs song zhing 'gro la so sor 'gro bar 'gyur ba rnams kyang nags da'i 'od kyis kun tu snang bar byas pa'i
stobs kyis bai DUr sngon po'i mdog tu 'gyur ro// bya rnams kyang sngon po de dganyid na gnas pa yin no// 'di lta ste// yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bya ni/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyanapa'i/
mi rnams grib ma sngon po'i nigs su zhugs par gyur nas/ yid kyi rjes su 'jun pa gang dag dpyad par byang n/ de dag bya de dag rnams kyis rtsa bar byed do// rtag par rab tu dgar ba zhes

bya ba'i legs par gnas pas ni demathong bar gyur pas kyang/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi skyes bu rnams phyir zhing chos rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// grang ba dang dro ba zhes bya ba'i bya de dgamathong par
gyur pas kyang skyes bu grang bas nyen pa rnams gung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo bsanyen par gyur pa rnams kyang shin tu tshabar mi 'gyur ta/ byad dag rnams kyi mthus yin//gyur bsagangaskyes bu
ka no// rlung gi khang bod bzhes bya ba'i bya rnams kyisan yud tsam gcig la yang dpag tshad stong du 'gro ba yinato/ dmathong bar gyur pas kyang skyes bu rnams gnas gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod ba de
dang der bya da dag rnams kyi stobs kyis yud tsam la dpag tshad stong du phyin par 'gyur ro// shang shang te'u zhes bya ba'i bya rnams kyisan gleng thams cad kyi skyes bu rnams kyis rjod par byed
pa'i brjod pa rnams dang cha 'dra bar skad 'byin no// mi'i bde ba'i 'khrig pas rtag tu dga' bar byed pa rnams yin no// kha dog/rnam pasna tshogs pa'i sgo rnams kyis nya bar ma nges par gyur
cing rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rnams la 'di lta ste/ an+danIl dang/ mar ka ta dang/ rdo rje dang/ mu sa ra grawa dang/ shel dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i byu ru dang rnamA
so/ bya de dang de dag rnams mthong bar gyuran/ rab tu dga' bar ma 'gyur ba 'ga' yang mad do// des sang+kang+gashA ri'i grib ma sngon po'i nags la so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lto ba bzhin du
lus so sor rig par byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i sang gAsha'i rid la grib ma sngon po'i zhags
brgal bar gyur nas/ gzhan nags dag yod dam zhe na/ dus zos pa las byung pa'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i migagis mthong bar gyur pa sang kAsha'i ri la byanges par gnas pa zhes bya'o/
nags gnyes pa yod do// de na gnas par gyur pa'i bya de dag ni rtag tu dga' mgu rongs pa dang/ pad+ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyang rtagatu gang bsil ma'i 'khyag pas legs par bstams pa yin no//
'dzam bu gling yan pa chos kyi dusan 'chi 'phos par gyur pa de la ngang pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ dadeb rab tu gnas par byed pa yin no// de bzhin dumatsho ma dros pa'i ngang pa'i rgyal po dang rnam pa
sbra tshogs pa'i bya gzhan rnams thams cad rab tu gat+tas pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ kA ran Ta pa dang/ hAnItadang/ g.yu gu mnA ba rta dang/ pa ra pa tA dang/ la khaka dang/ i lA
li kA dang/ ji sgra ba dang/ hAdA: drang/ dris dga' ba dang/ sang mya tshu: dang/ lus pa bo dang/ sgras kun tu dga' ba dang/ dus drug tu rgyu ba dang/ klubashar bas dga'
ba zla ba shar bas dga' la/ mashar ban nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'i mdog go/ rtag tu phyi rol tu sgras kun nas rangs pa dang/ tsakra bAka dang/ gser dang mtshungos par gyur pa'i mdog dang/
kur dang/ ku rin gnas pa dang/ nyi mas mi rig pa dang/ na tsun lun dA: dang/ gcig pu nyon mongs pas dga' dang/ bung ba 'dub rnams ni gang dag gi sgra rnams da pag tshad
du snyan par thos pa rnams yin te/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi bung ba rnams kyis ba lang la gagasamad par ljon shing rtsa ba na gnas pa bzhin no// kang kA dang/ 2
[”]la 'jug par byed pa dang/ 'khor zhing rgyu ba dang/ sA rAdang/ khyis phyudang/ ba ra skyur dang/ ba Ta Thadang/ ze'u 'bru lus la gon nas pad+ma'i nang na gnas pa dang/ ut+pal sngon
ts+tshA po grol bar gyur pa'i mgrin pa dang/ ko yaka: dang/ bye'u nagamo dang/ gling ga'o skya dang/ ban dzul kA dang/ chu la dga' dang/ rtag tu dga' ba'i sgra sgrog pa dang/ pa/
dang 'dra ba'i sgra dang/ srin la dga' ba dang/ dpung 'byed pa la dga' ba dang/ zil pa'i thig ba dang/ 'dab ma'i mtha'an gnas pa dang rdums te/ de dag dang gzhan dag rnams kyang
rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams te/ mthong na yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i sgra 'don bar byed pa dga' bar gyur pa'i bya khrob dang rnam par bral ba rnams bya nges par gnas pa'i nags la byang phyogs sgra
mi snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams dang rtag par lhan cig tu rab tudaga' bar gyur pas rtsa dga' bar byed do// bya nges par gnas pa'i nags la so sor brtags par gyur pas yang dag pa ji lta ba
bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus rig par byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ sang kAhA'i ri bo la 'gas gzhan gsum pa gang yod na//
0/des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa gsum pa ni zub mo zhes bya ba'i nags yod de/ ljon shing rnams phan tshun gyis nye 'a khor rnamasan ljon shing
'thug bo'i grub ma rnams kyis mngon par khyab par gyur pa yin no// de la yang drob dang/ bsal ba'i grib ma rnams lan pas byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu skyed mos tshal du dga' ba
rnamasated shing gi gseb na rtsa dga' bar byedado// de la shing gi tshogs 'di dag rnams yod pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ti la ka dang/ klu'i ma tog dang/ a d+ha shal ma lA dang/ ko bi
d+ha rA dang/ sAl pA la dang/ 'dod pa dga' ba rnams dang/ bya ngal so ba dang/ sA lA dang/ tAlA dad/ shA mA dang/ nala'i rnam pa dang/ a ma dang/ kar bi ra
ka dang/ shi lin d+hu dang/ ba ku la dang/ ba ku ladang/ dris rang pa dang/ cha rdo d+ha ma dang/ hani tA la dang/ tAmA la dang/ kol kA: dang/ sin d+hu tsA ra dang na
gu ma dang/ mtshungs pa dang/ zla ba 'khor ba dang/ gza' rgyu ba dang/ rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang/ na tsu lun d+hadang/ lug pa'i lun d+ha: dang/ a bAd tha dang/ kadangu'u kA
dang/ sngo bsangs kyi sams dang/ ka bed tha dang/ pa lA dang/ nA Ta ka ra dang/ pan sAdang/ mo tsA dang/ srid sgrub dang/ kadamapa dang/ sngon po dang/ lhashing dang/
ru dzA yA na'i 'dabam dang/ chu skyes dang/ man d+ha rwa dang/ pad+ma ku sha sha yA dang/ na lA lAdang/ gangs kyi mdog dang/ dngul gyi mdog dang/ ba nurlu'i
ka/ 'dab ma dang/ rtsa mongal bso dang/ yul du 'pho ba dang/ snyoms par gnas pa klung du skyes pa dang/ kAshAka sha rA tsa dang/ phan tshun du 'thug pa dang/ snum pa dang/ phrag po'/
skyes pa dang/ a pA na'am rtog dang/ ud ku le nAdang/ sang sha tA kAdang/ byu ru'i shing dang/ gur kum gyi snying po dang/ nyi par bslad pa dang/ rdzas su btsugs pa'i skyes ba dang/
du ba'i mdog dang/ mer ma'i 'od dang/ rlung gis shin tu skulakha dang/ chu shing dang/ ko ki lA myos pa dang/ me tog gi rdul ma gon padang/ mig dang bcas pa btsums pa dang/ cha
shas su phye cha dang/ 'brus chan dang 'dra ba dang/ ud drum 'khrug pa dang/ bung ba'i 'khor ba dang/ rtsa mo gul ba dang/ rlung gis nga lab dang/ mya ngan med pa dang/ mig dga' ba
dang/ de dag de rnams yin no// de dgan ji ltar shing gi rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pa drug cu yin te/ gangam bgrangs pa'i shing gis rigasaMsu gyur pa bar mdang tham rnams ni ma gtogs pa yin no//
de kho na bzhin du khrab mo na rab tu phal chab r gyur pa'i 'bab chudang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang bcas pas dga' ba yin te/ byang phyogs sgromi snyan pa'i mi rnams 'jig pa dang/ nadadang
wa gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa rnams rnam par bral bdang/ rigs nadamed pa dang/ phan tshun du phrag dog dang/ 'thab rtsod kyi 'jigs pa rnams med par grub nas rtsa dga' ba' byed do// deltar sang
gsha'i ri khrab mo'i gnas la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su
lta zhing gnasataM/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi gling go'i dang posangakAngasha'i nags bzhi pa la gzhanabasil ba'i chu ci yod/ des thos pa las byung bo shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis
mthong bar gyur pa bsil ba'i chu'i klung chu rnamasani rab tu phal che ba yod la/ jiskad du brjod pa'i ljon shing dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa yin no// chu
klung yod pa rnams 'di lta sta/ bsal ba'i chun rgyar dpag tshadadu gyur pa'o// chu klung zab mo'i chudang/ 'gatu dang ba'i chu dang/ gtsang ma'i chu dang/ 'od ma'i chu dang/ dgu 'bru'i chu
dang/ zlab rgyu ba dang/ 'o thug gi 'dam dang/ gram sogagi chudang/ ngang ngur gyis gongab dang/ dang pa kun tu sgra 'byin pa dang/ dbyangs snyan pa dang/ martog sgrub dang/ sems
'gro ba dang/ 'u ruru'i sgras 'bab pa dang/ rlabs 'byung ba dang/ bde ba'i chu dang/ kAdam pa 'khod pa nyid dang/ nor bu'i mchu can rnams kyiso'adzin pa dang/ chu srin ku ra ma mang po )
nyid dang/ nya ro hi'akhor ba dang/ rus smral gyis gang ba dang/ chu srinan kras bskor bdang/ yid bade bar 'bab pa dang/ lbu ba'i 'phreng ba dang/ rab tu dga'
bar gyur pa'i chu dang klu mtshungs bdang/ char dang char gyi rjes su 'byung ba'i chu klung dang/ dbyangs can gyis mdog du 'bab pa dang/ dus su 'bab padang/ rid pa rtse mo'i dang/ gsar
gyi chu dang/ dngul gyi mdog dang/ mu tig gi bye mdang ldan pa dang/ ri bo la rgyu ba dang/ sngon 'khor ba dang/ mu sA ro gal rgyan du byas pa dang/ badru ma'i shang dang ldan pa dang/
dbyed dga' ba dbyar sprin rab tu dang ba'i chu 'bab pa dang/ rtse mo la 'jug par dga' bo dang/ ganges yod pa dang/ nyi ma shar b.ragyur pas mi rig pa dang/ myur ba'i chu dang/ rlabs
po rab tu 'jug pa dang/ a tu 'dang/ tsu lunada'abab pa dang/ dri'i chudang/ kata ka'i dris bsgos pa dang/ dbyar dag/'badang/ d+hu na d+hug rwa dang/ nyi 'khor na khyab pa dang/ dpal/
chu med pa 'bab pa rgyab nas klung kun tu gang bar rab du 'bab pa dang/ dmababa'i chu dang/ dga' bas 'jug pa dang/ sngon gyi du ba'i stobs dang/ sprin gyi 'gros dang/ dri za'i dbyas
canadang/ rnga'i sgra dbyangs can dang/ skadakyi dbyangs canadang/ klu'i bu mo mngon par dga' b dang/ gsangab pa rtsa dga' dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa rtsa dga' bas gnas pa dang rnams yin no//
de dag ni risang kAsha'i nags bzhi pa sprin dkar po la ji ltar 'bab chu'i gtso bor gyur pa bdun cu yin par rab tu brjod pa yin no// bar mtha ma'i chu klung rnams ni ma gtogs pa yin no//
gzhal du med par dul/'a bar 'gyur ba'i shing dang/ ma tog dang/ bya rnams kyi yon tan gyi bla na med par gyur pa'i bsil ba'i chu'i nags la so sor brtag par gyur bas kyang yang dag
pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol rig par byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab
sam: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sang ka sha'i ril yeshAmang zhes bya ba'i nags lnga yod pa yin te/ gang lakumibasdad pa 'di dag rtswa dga' bar byed pa'o// 'di lta sto/ khro ba
brul ba dang/ ba su ki dang/ stu'agodang/ mchab 'i dug dang/ glog gi 'phreng ba dang/ sprin gyi nye 'khor chos laM dbang ba dang/ rnam pa de lta bu'i klu stong phrag bdun rtse dga' bar
byed do// byang phyogs sgra ma snyan gyi nye 'khor rnams su chos kyi char pa 'bebs par byed do// ji lta'i sa gzhi dang nam mkha'i nyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i 'jig
ston pa rnams dang 'dra ba yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su ltazhing gnas te/ ci sang kAsha'i ri nags rnams ni ji skad du sngar bstan pa bzhan
@#// du gyur pa yin la/ ljon shing re re la maragyur ba rnams dang/ ma tog tu gyur pa rnams dang/ 'bras bur gyurab rnams dang/ chu klung du gyur pa rnams dang//
do'i gsab tu gyurapa rnams dang/ sa phyogs kyi char gyur pa rnams dang/ rtswa'i gsab tu gyur ba rnams dang/ ri'i khrod khrod dang khong gsang du gyur pa rnams dang/ 'bab chu ra'agyur ba la
yang rung ste/ khab kyis phug pa'i bar tsam gang dag la yang sems can thamasacad lan brgya dang// gal te na lanabargya stong du yang ma skyes pa dang/ ma shi ba dang/ 'chi/
ma 'phos pa dang/ skyes par ma gyur pa 'am/ yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang/ thadad du mgyur pa dang/ rnam par gyes par mgyur pa dang/ rnam par bral bar ma gyur pa dang/
sku gzhan du ma gyur pa 'am/ dgrar gyur pa'i lus 'di lan brgya dang/ de nas lan stong du dang/ lan brgya stong du yang skyes par ma gyur par modado// gang la sems can rnams thams cad
kyang shi ba dang skyes par ma gyur pa de ni khab kyi bug pa tsam yang go skabasam mthong ngo// des sang kAsha'i ri la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dulus so
sor rig pa'i byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ri'i rigs gzhan yod dam zhe na/
gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa bas thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa/ lha rnams kyis dga' ba'i tshal dang
'dra b.ru mnyam pa nas bya ba'i ri gzhan yod do// de'i ljon shing dang/ 'brasabu dang/ chu klung dang/ ri'i phug rnams kyi dga' bzhi rgyus par sngar sang kA sha la jiskad bshad pa
bstan no: dga' bar gyur pa'i dusakyi khyad par rnams so so'i bye brag tu bya sta/ rAmanyam par gyur pa'i ri gang la brgya phrag gsum ni gsar gyi yin sta mtshungs pa med pa yin no//
'od zer rnams nyim gnyis pa bzhin du gsal lo// ru brgya phrag ldan dal gyi rang bzhin yinatA/ gang la dngul gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni gung sngar bshad pa rnams yin no// yon tan rnams
thams cad la yang khyad par yodad/ rumanyam pa'i ri de'i 'khor rnams na yang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams zlabargyus pa'i 'od dang 'drab yin no// de dag rnamasan 'jigasapa/

dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i mnge dung ldan pa yin no// 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams ra mnyam pa'i ralan ji ltar rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams dga' ba'i tshal na dbyar zla ba bzhi lha rdzas kyi
'dod pa'i yon tan lngas yongs su tshim par yang dag par ldan par gyur pa la/ rtsa dga' byed pa de bzhin du mngon bar rtse dga' bar byed do// de ltaran yang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu
rnams rgyalachen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi so sor khyad par ni gangag yin zhe na/ lha rnamasanI sha dang/ rus pa dang/ chu ser dang bral ba yin la/ 'jigs
) ba dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams nisha dang/ rus ba dang/ chu sa' dang ma bral bar yod pa yin no// lha rnams dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams kyi khyad par ni de ltar yin no//
skyes bu 'jigs pa dang bral b rnams ni bdag 'dzan yod pa dang/ nga rgyalamed padang nges par gong du 'gro bar gyur pa yin no// lha rnams ni de ltar yang ma yin no// yang 'jig
padang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris gzha'i lha rnams kyi soso khyad par gang dag yinan/ rA mnyam pa'i ri'i nye 'khor rnams dpag bsam gyi shing nyim gnyis pa
ltar rab tu gsalobar byed do// gang dang gang dag 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis sems kyis bsams par gyur ba de dag rnams ljon shing de dag rnams las byung bar 'gyur/
'o: :thag pas btags pa 'am/ nor bu'i rigs rnamasasag/ rgyan gyi rigs rnams drang/ bras dang/ sgom gyi chu bo yang brgya phrag dang/ denas stong phrag kyang 'bab bo// ji

skad du bshad pa gyur ba'i bya rgyags pa rnams kyang rtse dga' bar byedado// gser gyi lam rnams kyis brgyan par gyur pa dang/ bin+d+harma sngon po rnams kyis pad+ma'i rdzing bumang po brgya phrag dang//
ca stan stong phrag rnams la/ ngang pa dang ka lan da pa rnams kyis gang ba/ tsakra hAka rjes su rgyu ba dang/ ri dgas kyi tshogs rnams rjes su stonapar 'gyurab ni/ gsar gyi ra dgas rnan
byu ru'i rang bzhin gyi rwa dang/ mus ra'i mig dang/ rwa dza btsA'i rmig pa ste/ ri dgas kyi 'gis gzhan rnams kyis kyang rjes su rgyu bar byed ba yin no// ra de'i nye 'khor rnams na mu tig gi
rlabs spel ba'agyur pa'i 'khri shing gi tshogs phan tshun du 'khri bas g.yogs pa dang/ rwags shi ri de la ko ki la dang/ rma byadang/ ngang pa rnams sgra 'byin par byed pa dang/ ra
'di la 'bab pa stong phrag brgyas kyad kun tu gang bdang/ 'di la chu klung dum rnams dang/ shing drung du smos pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur pa yin te/ rta'akhor rnams na yon tan/
mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa yin no// des byang phyogs sgra mesan pa'i ri bo gnyis pa ru mnyam pal kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du lus so sor rtogs so// chu
klung gang dang gang dag robab par gyur pa de dag rnamasan mtshungs par yon tan brgyadadang ldan nga'i chu yin no// 'di lta sta/ ro phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'ag tu dang ba dang/ dra zhim pa dang
skom pa sol bar byed pa dang/ bsal ba'agyurapa dang/ 'thungs par gyur pa na lus n ba'am byed pa dang/ chu bal gyis mig gtsang bar ma byas pa dang/ chu srin ma ka ras mareg pa dang
la d+hawaM @#/// des 'thungs bsalus tshim par byed pa dang rnamasaso// nad kyang skyod par mi byed do// mtsho rnams kyang rnam pa dum yod do// 'di lta ste/ rgya chen pos nu dang/
byem bcom pa dang/ gang lnga pa dang/ kA rand pa'i klung dang/ ngang pa'i chu dang/ ka dam pa'i bya rnams kyis bcom pa dang/ bya brgya phrag gis kun tu gang ba dang/ chen po
rab tu 'babapa dang/ pad+mas bkab par gyur pa dang/ 'od ma skyes pa dang/ shing gisagayogs pa dang/ zab mo dang/ zla ba dga' ba dang/ rtag tu zla ba dang 'dres ba'i
chu dang rlabs 'khor bar gyur ba dang/ 'od mas khyab par gyur pa dang/ rags pa 'dzan pa dga' ba dang/ shol 'khor bar byed pa dang/ rlabs g.yo ba dang/ chu brtan
padrang/ rta 'khor ba dang/ chadang kun tu 'brel badrang/ rtsa mo'i gsab dang/ khrus kyi rdzing bu'i 'phrongab dang/ rlabs su 'jug pa dang/ gtsang ba'i chu dang/ zla ba'i lus dang//
dkyil 'khor dang/ dri ma mad pa dang/ 'od ma'i chu dang/ rdzing bu'i 'phreng ba dang/ rdul ba la la bsob zla bdag 'ab dang/ shal 'jug pa dang/ rlabs g.yo ba dang/ chu
brtan pa dang/ rtags pa'i chudang/ lha dga' ba dang/ dga' ba'i tshu dang/ ro bzang po dang/ jiltar 'dod pa'i rodang/ longs spyod du gyur pa dang/ ko'u shub+hadang/ bdud rtsi/
'bab pa dang/ mtsho'i mchog dang/ klu'ib rudang/ mdzes pa dang/ a rdzunadang zhes bya ba sta/ de dag rnams ni mtsho bzhi bcu rtsa bdun yin no// ri'i mchog tu gyur pa ra mnyam
pa 'di dag thams cad kyang yon tan brgyad pa'i chu sngar jiskad bshad pa bzhin no// rwa mnyam pa'i ri yang matho b.la'agyur ba ninam mkha' 'bigs pa bzhin du gnas pa yin no// nags
rnams kyang yon tan dudag rnams thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa yin te/ 'di ltar rdul bas rag ba'i nagasadang/ zlaba'i mdog dang/ dngul gyi ljon shing ni dalagyi rang bzhin gyi ljon
shang rnams kyis bskor ba dpag tshad brgya yin no// nor bu'i 'od kyi mdog dang nags de'i nye 'khor na mthong bar gyur pa rnams ni/ nagasadel yang pad+ma'i rdzing bu 'di dag rnams yin no//
'di lta sta/ chub l dang rnam par bral ba dang/ bung bas khyab pa dang/ dung gimadog dang/ rtag pa'i chu dang/ rnam par mthong bar dga' ba dang/ kAtam pa'i chu dang/ ngang pa'i gshog
pas bcom pa dang/ rab tu rtsa bar byed pa dang/ skya bo rnams mngon pa'i dga' ba dang/ mgo bo mthong ba dang/ bag med pa rnams rtse ba dang/ rtag tu mngon par dga' ba dang/ rtag tu pad+ma

rab tu dga' ba dang/ chu la sbyong ba'i sa gzhi dang/ de dag rnams ni ji ltar pad+ma'i rdzing bu'i gtso bor gyur ba bcu drug yin te/ gang dag gi ming rnams kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba'i bar ma dang tha
maragyur pa brgya phrag rnams dang/ des stong phrag rnamasan ma gtogs so// thams cad kyang 'dam bag mad pa dang/ chu bal gyis nye bar ma bcom pa dang/ ngang
! padang ka ran pa dang/ dad du rnams sgra 'don par byed pa yin no// rtag tu dga' ston gyi nyi mar gyur pa byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa'i skyes bu rnams bya rtag tu myos pa dang/ shang shang
de'u dang/ bya gling ga ra dzradang/ rma bya rnams nags dang rtaba'i rtags rnamasan sgra 'don pan re mnyam ba'i ri yin no// rams pa'i ri la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du phyi la gyi lus so sor rig par byed do// gzhan yang 'phags ba'i bden pa bzhi la lhag par mos par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing
gnas te/ rA mnyam pa'i ri la rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am// bde ba 'am/ bdag dang bcas pa 'am/ stong pa ma yin pa'i gnas dag yod dmanyan/ sngar bzhin no// gang la yang
'khor bar gtogs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyang ma skyes pa dang/ ma shi bdang/ rgas par ma gyur pa 'am/ 'thun pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang rnams thams cad kyang tha dad
du gyur pa dang/ rnam par gyes pa dang/ rnam par bral ba dang/ slob dang kun tu ldan par ma gyur pa rnamasa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa des rwa mnyam ba'i ri de la gnas gcig kyang ma mthong ngo//
kha gang dag rtag pa 'am/ brtan pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ bdag dang bcas par gyur pa 'am/ stong pa ma yin pa dang/ gang la sems can rnams thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang/ ma/
rgasapa dang/ mngasha ba yang mad de/ 'thun par yid du 'ong bar gyur pa rnams thams cad kyang mdapar 'gyurab dang/ tha dad du 'gyur ba dang/ 'bral bar 'gyur ba dang/ sru bar
'gyur ba dang kun tu ldan par 'gyur ba yin no// rab tu ldan par gyur pa yin pa nyidakyi phyir 'khor ba 'di thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin no// de ltar mi rtag par gyur pa'i gnas rnams thamA
cadra gang la yang sams can rnams thams cad kyang ma skyes pa dang/ mnga'i badrang/ skyes par ma gyur pa ni khab kyis phug pa tsam gyi yul phyogs kyang med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhir gyur pa'i dran pa dang ldan pas byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyis ri bo gnyis par gyur pa/ rwa mnyam par gyur pa thams cad la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang phyi rol gyi lus lta
bar byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan nanags dga' bar gyur pa gzhan dag dmigs sam zhe na/ des thos
pa las byungaba'apishes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa'i ri gsum yang yod pa yin te/ ri dgas kyi sgra dul ba zhes bya ba'i ri'o// de la dga' bar gyur pa khyad par med pa gang
[7 ]/// dag yin pa de dag rnams ni sang ka sha'i ri dngar mnyam par gyur pa'i re la yongs su bsgrag par phrad do// ri dgas kyi sgra dul pa ri bod la ni 'bab chu dang/ chu
rnams phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chang gi chu klungaphun sum tshogs par gyurapa dang/ gos kyi ljon shing phun sum tshogs par gyur pa rnams dang/ 'di dag kyang khyad pa ra yin te/
'di ltar gsar dang dngul gyi ljon shing rnams la rtag par dus drug tu ma tog gi 'phrang ba rnams kyis phyug par gyur nas da ga' ba dang ldan pa bzhin du rgyas pa yin no// 'a
na rang gi 'od dang ldan par khem bzhin du rab tu gsal bar yang byed do// phan tshun du 'od 'phro bar gyur pas kyang re dra las kyi sgradul ba'i ri bo 'di rab tu gsal bar byed do// de la rags
'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta sta/ gsar dang ldan pa dang/ dngul mthon por brtswa gas pa dang/ myos par sgong ba sa skyes pa'i ngos dang/ mnanan nam la btegan 'ba'
dung rnams so// de la gsar dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i nagasan dpagatshad brgya ba ste/ gsar gyi ljonashing rnams la bung bas las/1 par khyab par yin no// dngul mthon por brtsi ba/sa pa'i na bar
ni dpag tshad sum brgya pa ste/ dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi ljon shing rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur nas/ zla ba brgya stong bzhin du rnam pa ro gsal bar byed do// sang ge rnams kyis kyang kun tu gang
ba yin no// nags de yang thams cad nas dkar bor kun tu snang ba yin te/ rtag par rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i bya rnams kyis kyang kun tu gang ba rnamasan ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no//
ri dgas kyis sgra dul ba'i ri bo na gsum pan myos pa'i sgo nga las skyes pa'i ngos zhes bya ba ste/ da la nagasad nani bag med bas rab tu dag 'a ba'i bya rnams yod do// nags de'i nye 'khor
rnamasan yang skyes bu gang dang gang dag rab tu gnas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyang rtag du dul bzhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// skyes bdag rtag tu myos pa'i sgo nga las skyes ba'i nags
na rab tu dga' bar gyur pa 'dete/ rang 'dod pa bzhin du gyur pa'i gabri brjid kyis lha'i tshogs rnams dang 'drab yin no// ri dgas kyis sgra dul ba'i ra lanagasabazhi bzhi mnan na nam
kha btegana' phar ba zhes bya ste/ rnam pa dang 'phar ba'i nags dran ljon shing gang dag gsar dang/ gsar rab tu 'bar ba dang/ ba du ma'i rang bzhin yin pa rnams la ni ma bsnying pa'i bya
rnams kyis rtag tu gang ba yanano// nam la 'phar ba'i nags ni dpag tshad lnga yin no// rtags de'i nyo'akhor rnamasan skyes bu gang dag rab tu gnas par gyur pa de dag rnams kyi tha snyad
ni rab tu phal che bar myos ba zhes bya ba pa nano// rab tu char myos pa'i skyes bu rnams gal ten zhing 'phar bar gyur pa'i nags su rtse dga' bar byedan/ sa do dganekashi ltar 'jam pa dang/
ba @#// shing bal 'dra bar gzhi mnanan nam la bteg na 'a phar ba'i san no// jiskad du brjod pa'i ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ljon shing dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma'i
[7]dzingabu dang/ sra sgrogs pa'i bung ba'i tshogasakyis gang bar gyurapa rnams ni nam zhing 'phar ba'i nags de la yang sngar gyibazhin no// des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi rigs pa ri dgas kyi
dgra dul ba legs par mthong bar gyur pas kyang yang dag par ji lta bas lus so sor rig par byed de/ sngar bzhin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes
la su lta zhing gnas te/ gzhan yang byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' bar gyur pa gzhan ci dam gsan/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong ba'i gyur pa
sngon dkar po rgya bzhes bya ba'i ri bi 'orakhor du dpag tshad stong yin no// shin tudakadar bar gyur pa'i dngul gyirang bzhin te/ rigang gi 'od zer gyis bla ba'i 'od kyang gas bar ma gyur to/
dpar na 'dzam bu gling du zla ba shar bar gyur pa na gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ skar phran gyi red kyang med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ris kyang zla ba'i 'od mi gsal bar

byed do// sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i ri bo'i drung du yang skyes bu gang dag rab tu gnas par byed pa de dag rnams ni mi rtog gi 'phrang ba gon pa zhes bya ba mang du 'gyur ro// skyes nas sprin dkar po rgyu ba'i
[/]bol rtagatu rtsa ba la chad cha' byed pa rnamasam tog gi ze'u 'bru gon par gyur nas rtag tu gus dga' bar gyur pa dang/ rgyun du yang pad+ma'i tshalanags na mngon par dga' bar byed do// sdug
gu dang bcas par gyur pa dang/ rab tul/yobar byed pa dang/ rnam par 'khrulab dang/ rnam par 'khor ba dang/ rtag tu kun nas 'ching ba med pa rgyags pa dang/ rtag tu mya ngan
dang rnam par bral b rnams yin no// gzhan yang sprinadakar po rgyu ba'i ri de dag rnams 'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/ rdasgra 'byin pa'i sgra dang/ ngang ngur rnams kyi rjes su
bsgrugs par byed pa dang/ yid kyi rjesasu 'thun pa dang/ chus kun nas sgrogs pa dang rnams so// rnga sgra kun nas sgrug pa'i nags su 'phreng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams kyi rjesgra dag
sgrogs par phyed do// sgra snyan par gyur pa de ni dpar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ dra pa Na pe dang/ dung gi sgral chags bar gyur pa yin la/ dbazhin du rwa sgra kun
nas sgrogs pa'i nags lha rnams rnga sgra sgrogs par byed pa yin no// de dag rnams la ni 'dzamabu gling gi glu mkhan rnams kyis bcu drug gi char yang mi chog gi/ ji skad dubashad par gyur
pa'i ri dgas dang/ bya dang/ pad+ma dang/ ljon shing dang/ nags dang/ nye ba'i nags dang/ khrus kyi rdzing bu dang/ mtsho'u dang/ gsar dang/ dngul gyi sa gzhi'i cha rnams
dang 'bab chudang rnams kyi yon tan rnams kyi de lta de ltar gyi rnga sgra sgrogs pa'i nags na yon tan rnams thams cad kyang yod pa ni sngar bahin no// 'phrong bgon par
ka gyur pa'i skyes bu rnams ni rnga sgra kun nas sgrog par byed pa'i gdangs kyis rtag tu 'dod pa'i sgra dang rnams la rnam par chags pa yin te/ dper na gnong pa thogs pa'i khyu rnams kyi
dga' ba'i tshal gyi nye ba'i nags bzhin du rtagatu 'dod pa'i sgra dang/ 'od ng/ gzugs deng/ de rnams sdod do// nags gnyis pa dang ngur rnams kyi rjes su sgrog par byed pa
zhes bya ba sta/ nags de la ni ngang ngur rnams kyis rjes su slogs par byed pa dang/ pad+ma'i sdongabu rnams kyang brgya phrag rnams / de nas stong phrag zas sa yo/da do// de dag rgyun
kyi ni ming yang brjod cing gzung bar mi nus so// ngang ngur gas kyi rjes su sgrog par nags la ri dgas kyis rigs 'di dag rnams yod pa ni 'di lta sta/ rnam par bkrakha'i ba dang/
rin po che bdun gyis brgyan pa'i lus 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ri dgas dang/ ku rangagA dang/ mar kA dang/ mar kA 'dod pa dang/ shan tu dga' ba dang/ sam pA phyi nudang/ rtsa mo
g.yo b rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang/ khor yug gi mig dang/ kar ke ta'i lte ba dang gsar gyi rwa dang/ logs dal gyi legs dang/ rlung gi shugs dang/ shing gi rtsa ba na rgyu
[/ ]bangang/ chu'i sgra 'bab par 'gro bar byed pa dang/ nags kyi 'phreng bar bgrang ba dang/ bi dru mi'i lus dang/ lag na'i phyogs dang/ lto lta ri ba dang/ bar po tadang/ gang
shu ru Na dang 1 pags panag bo dang/ rtsa ba'i 'od dang/ lang tsho la bab dang/ shin tu 'jam pa drung/ dkar bo'i tshogs dang rnams yin te/ de dag rnams ni ringags
kyi ragis nyi shu rtsa lnga yan no// 'byung ba gon ba'i skyes bu rnams dwang lhan cig tu rtse dga' bar byed de/ rang gi las dang 'dra bar gyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong bar
byed do// sprin dkar bo rgyu ba'i ril yid kyi rjes 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i nags yodado// nag gas de nasan 'phrang bgon ba'i mi rnams kyi yid kyi rjes su 'thun par gyur pa gang dang gang
dag yin pa do dag rnams nyid ljon shing rnams las 'thob bar ba gyur ro// nags dang/ nye ba'i nags drang rnams gang dag yin pa thams cad kyang dga' ba rnams yin te/ sngar
bzhin no// sprin dkar bo rgyu ba'i ri bo la nags bzhi pa chu'i sgra na nas sgrog pa zhes bya ba yod do// de lani rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa
rnams rtsa bar byed do// yang gang gi tshe rdul gyis gnod par gyur pa na de'i tshe rang 'dod pa'i cha byad kyis chur 'jug ste/ chu la kun tu 'phyo bar byed do// de la rig pa 'dzin
@#// pa'i rigasa'adi dag rnams yod de/ 'di lta sta/ bdabal chags pa'i shugs dang/ 'ger bzhed par bgropa dang/ nam mkha'i stobs dang/ sprin rab tu
[7/]'byed par byed pa dang/ nyi ma'i lamadu legs par rgyu ba dang/ ri dgas kyi 'gros dang/ bo'u rudang/ shin tudud pa dang/ kung kedang/ ri rnams la kun ngashi dang/ ricalas
la kun chags pa dang/ rtol tu myos pa'i drodang/ namakha brgyu bar byed bdad/ mAkhaN nang gnas pa dang/ cimana' phugan rgyu ba dang/ rtag pa'i shugs dad/ dang pa'i
shing rtadang/ glang po'i shing rta dang/ glog 'khyug par byed pa dang/ ma la la na gnas pa dang/ ka ta ka'i 'phrang bamchog dang ldan pa dang/ bud mdal srod pa dang/ chang ba rnams
kyi btud pa dang/ rirab lhun po la gnas pa dang/ kun tu khyab pa'i zhen pa dang ! rtag tu dga' ba dang/ ma tog gi 'phreng ba 'phyang ba dang/ sa gzhi la rgyu ba dang/ snga yang ba/ sa
ts+tsa ba ba dang rnams te/ de dgon rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs sum cu rtsa gnyis yinal/ sbyin dkar po rgyu'i ri chu sgra nas sgrogs pa'i nags de nyid las/nas nas dga' bar byed do// rnam
ba sna tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams kyis rab tu brgyan zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgod pa dang/ 'gying ba dang/ rtsa ba dang/ kun tu spyod par yang byedado// de'i las kyi mthus yin no// de 'dra
bar gyur ba'i bud med dang lhan cig tu zhen pa 'a byed do// de ltar sprin dkar bo 'dzin bzhin gsadang/ nyiba'i nags dang bcas pa rnams thams cad kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so
sor ga 'byed de/ sprin dkar bo 'dzan pa'i ri bo 'di lo gcig tu nges par gyur pa dang/ rtag pa drang/ brtan pa dang/ thar thug dang/ myun las 'das bar 'gro bar
'thob pa'i bde ba yod dmazhin/ das rtag pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ thar thug dang/ yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur ba'i bde ba ni gcig kyang ma mthong ste/ ji ltar nyi
mal mun pa bzhin no// de ltar 'jis/rtan pa'i bde ba rnams kyadamyong bar mngar ba dang/ rnam par smin pa rtsub pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i dang/ srid pa las
nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa dang/ 'bras bu cu ba ba yin te/ kim pa'i 'bras bu'adrub dang/ dug dang/ mtshon dang/ mdang mtshungs par gyur ba dang/ dus de tsam
du dga' bar gyur pa yin no// gar mkhan gyi tshon rtsi bzhin du yud tsam cig dga' ba yin no// glogadangamatshungs par shin tu g.yo ba minano/ rab 'bab chu'ashugs dang 'dra ba dang
nye bar 'tsho ba dang bcas pa dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang mtshungs bar slu bar byed pa dang/ skye bo rnams thams cad kyang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang/ shing thog rnams thams
cad bzhin du ci nas kyang lhung bar 'gyur bar mtshungs pa dang/ dug gikhrus dang 'drab r yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang/ spu gri'i so'i mang ba bzhin du rdzob

ka dang ! na brgya stong dum rnams su yang glu bar byed ba yin pa dang chu klung gi 'gram gyi shing pa zhanyidus par khosar ltung bar 'gyur bar mtshungs pa yin no// rnamakho de lta bu'i 'a dod pa rnams la
kun tu bltas par gyur nas/ rnal 'byor spyod pa la sa bar skyob skye bar 'gyur ro// yang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur pa dang/ tshul bzhin dal byed ba mthong ba dang ldan zhing rnam ba'i byad
bar gyur pa'i mthong ba dang lang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing bganas te/ byango gas sgra mi snyan na dga' bar
'gyur ba'i ri ngogs kyi rigs yod dam zhin/ des thos pa las byungapa'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'amag gis mthong bar gyur pa mthopar btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i ri dpar/ tshad stong yod
pa yin te/ nyo 'khor rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'od kyi khe phrangar dang ldan pa min no// de la shing gi rig sa na 'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/ brgya'i 'dab ma da/ gser
'ba' ba'i sdong bu dang/ byu ru'i 'dab ma can rnams dang/ dngul gyi sdong bu dang/ gser gyi 'dab ma dang ldan par mar pa'i kong bu brgya rtsa brgyad 'drab rnamos yin no do/ ri rnam pa/
[”]pas/ du ma dang/ shing gi rig gzhan dag rnams drang/ pad+ma'i rigs rnams dang/ skyed mos tshal gyi rigs rnams dang/ ri degs kyi legs rnams dang/ ri'i rtsa mo rigs rnam pa du
ma rnams kyang sngar bani no gagro bar brtsags pa'i yan lag gibartse gas pa'i rgyur nid pa gatshad nyis brgya'o// de'ibartsa las pa'i gcigan ri rab lhun po la gnas pa'i 'phrang ba thogs
zhes bya ba'i lha dang/ ba wangagasum pa zhes byaba'i lharnamasartso dab 'byedago khi stong gsum pa'i lhan lhunabo'i bang rimakha/tungaba'agyur nas mtho ba'i brtsags pa'i 'o la rtsa dga' bar
byed de/ ri bod dga' bar gyur pa'i phyir ro// mthon po de'i yan lag gis bar gas pa'i nyal khor rnamasano'an po cha'i rang bzhin te/ 'bang du nad bag tshad lnga bcu yin no/ brtsogs
ma lta yod pa'i yan lag gi brtsegs ba'i rgyur ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yin no// de la brtse gas ma gcigegasoral nor bu'i khyod yin te/ ri bo cha rnams thams cad kyang dad la skye bar
'gyur 'o/ 'di ltaste/ bi drum dang/ byur dang/ brgyudang/ chu sar gcu dang/ zhal dang pad+ma rA ga dadra/ su gum ra dang/ in+d+hanIl dang/ ni ching bo dang/ ma bta
ba'i gos kyang 'byung ngo// gnyis pan dengul ring bzhin yizhitaM/ dadul gyi ljon shing rnams phun sum tshogs pa gongasha'e zhes bya ba'i tsan dan skyob yin no// lha dang lha ma yin gyis 'khrub kha
gang gnas hazhal bshu kun gyis khang yin pa lho rnams dang lha ma yin rnams lhan cig tu g.yul bkye bar gyur pas mtshon gyis smas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu brgyal bar gyur pa rnams kyi lus zhad gad

bar byed pa yin no// go shur kha pa zhes bya ban redi'i lhan cig skya ba'i ming yin no// de'i tshon don la/nga goshir kha ba'i ming yin no// ri'i rtse mo gsum bzhi lha'i bu mo dga' ba zhes bya ba'i yi
te gang lta'i bu mo rnams rtse dga' bar byed pa nags dang/ taba'i zhags dang/ gas ra dang/ dngul dang/ bzhung nyams kyi le 'u 'brudang/ gzhan bcu de jam po rnam dag ngag tu
sgyu ston par byed pa dang/ rab dang 'a bar gyur bas rgodapa dang/ rol ba dang/ rtsa bar byed pas rnam par rgyu ba'i dgar rnams la srod pa la rnam par bslad bar gyur pa'i phyis pa so so skye ba

rnams dam pa'i chos nyan pa la kha phyir phyogs par 'gyur zhing rtag tu 'dod pa la rnam par chags par gyur pas ro de 'i rtse la rtag tu 'khod par byed pa// rwa bzhi pa ni gang la rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyun
'bru'i rtags dang/ nye ba'i nags rnams la rtse dga' bar byed pa yin no// da la lang rtag tu myos pa'i 'i dgasadang/ bya dang/ gsang ba pa'i lha dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ mi rnams dang
tu 'khor rnams yang rgun 'bru'i chu klung rnams rab tu 'bab pa yin// kha cig ni sbrang rtsi 'o re yanin// kha cig ni gdug pa ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i 'o yin no// khag ni 'dres par gyur pa'i ri
[4]/ sta rwade lan chu klung gi 'gram rnams las gsaras de sngag skye'o// ba lang dang/ ma he dang/ phag pa dang/ glang bo che dang/ lce sbyang dang/ rnamo dang/ phyugs dang/ sbyang
kidang/ glu dang/ lung dang/ sang ga dang/ drod dang/ lnga dang/ bya dang/ de dang de dag rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa'i gzugs rnams dang kha dog du mar gyur pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin

phal che ba rnames mthongango/ khong dag phyir gang gsanas le sbram rnams skyabar 'gyur ba'i ri'i rtse mo dang klus gaser sa le sbram 'di dag rnams yin no// rtsa gam lnga pa gang la gsar gyi 'dab mdang

bat+taglu'i yu ba can ni tu 'jam pa ru gyur pa'i pad+ma rnams skya'o// nyo ba kho'i kun na yang de khruma'i ljon shing rnams kyis gang ba yin no// dul pad+ma'i rdzing bu 'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/
kun daga' ra ba'i rgyas ba dang/ pad+mas khyab gyur ba dang/ pad+ma dus su rgyu ba dang/ pad+ma dmar po kun tu khyab pa dang/ nyim ston pa dang/ gzhi 'jam pa dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ ljon

shing khri ba ba dang/ ma tog dri zhim pa 'byung pa dang/ brtan pa'i chu dang sta/ da dag rnamasani pad+ma'i dzi bu bcu gcig yin no// rwa de'i ming yang pad+mas kun tu khyab pa zhes bya ba yin no// chu
klung rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri dang 'os legs par gang bar gyur pa rnams nya'akhor rnams na 'bab ste/ ro drug dang ldan pa yin no// 'dod pa'i ljon shing rnams thams cad dang/
ga bar skyes pa dang/ ljon shing dang/ ma tog dang/ chu bo dang/ khrus kyi rdzing bu dang ldan pa rnams ni sngam bzhin no// des ru lnga pa la kun tu blta bar gyur pas
kyad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la kun nas lta bar byed do// des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan b rnams kyis 'i lnga bamatho'abartsigs pa zhes bya ba la kun tu bltas par gyur
bas kyang yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la so sor rig par byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa las dang chos dag gi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dubyas nas mthon por brtse bas
shA pa'i ri la kun tu blta sta/ sams can 'di dag rnams ni las kyis chos kyi rnam par smin ba can yin te/ rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod par byed pa dang/ rang gi las rnams bzhu
par byas pa dang/ rang gis legs par byas pa rnams kyis ni der skyes pa yin la/ 'du ga las de dag zad par gyur nas nges par ltung bar gyur// mi dge ba'i las rnams kyisani
dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams su 'gyur ro// legs par byas pa rnams kyis nilha dang mi rnams kyi nang du'o// mtho bar brtsi gas kha'i ri'i nye 'khor na gang dag gnas pa de dag
rnams ni bde ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba yin no// bdeb la dga' ba'i skyas bu rnamasani rtag tu 'dod pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams yin te/ rtag tu 'dod pa rnams kyis dogs yod ba rnamA
[m/ ]yin na// 'di la tshigs su bcad pa/ ma la bud shing rnams dang ni// rgya mtsho la ni chu bo ltar// sred ldan 'a dod pas ngoms pa med// de phyir 'dod pa zhi po min// zhes bya ba yin te/
'di na sams can 'di dag rnams ni nges pa kho nar du du bar byas pa la dga' bar byed pa yin par rnal 'byor spyod pa des dri mdang rnam par bral ba'i mig gis mthong ngo// de dag rnams kyis
deshis pa yang ma yin te/ 'dus byas 'di dag rnams thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyibadag nyid yin no// thams cad kyang 'dzad cing 'god pa'i chos can gyi yin no// snying bo med dang
sgron mamad pa yin no// 'di dag rnams la ni mthar thug pa'i bde ba yod pa ma yin no// shes pa ma yin zhing/ zhi ba yang ma yin no// sams can 'di dag rnams thams cad kyi srog dang/
lang tshodang/ nad med dang/ phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'di dag rnams thams cad kyang bde ba ma yin zhing gtsang bam yin la mi rtag pa/ bdagamed pa/ snying po mad pa/
wu ba rdos pa dang chu'i chu bur lta bu zhe te/ gson b rnams ni thams cad kyang 'chiba'i mthar thug par 'gyur bayinal/ phun sum tshog pa rnams thams cad kyang rgyud pa'i
mthar thug par 'gyur ba yazhi// gnas de dgan dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'grodang/ ba rnams mi bslu ba yin no// dper na ji ltar nyi ma shar bar gyur pa de ni
[©]bya// nges pa'i nub par 'gyur ba lazhe no// de kho na bzhin du skyes pa rnamasan ngas bya gzhigs bya ba yin no// yang jilta jit+ta ras gzhi gzhon zhing lang tsho la bab par gyuran/
[r]ljon shing dang/ nags dang/ ho pa'i nagasadang/ de'u gsing dang bcas par 'gyur khro/ sa gzhi de b.rIs bar gyuran/ ljagangashing dang/ nags tshal dang/ nya ba'i na ga sa dang/
mtsho'u dang/ bad+madang bcas pa rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur ro// de kho na bzhin duso ka'i dus su lang tsho la bab ba sbrums ston ka'i dus su rings par 'gyur ba dang/ gzhon pa rnams
thams cad kyang rgas pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba 'di byang phyogs sgra ma snyan pa'i mi rnams kyis go ba yang ma yin no// lang dilta dzit+taramtshan mo char bab par gyur na chu klung rnams
phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ char bab pa'i dbang gis ngos gnyis kar yang mang du 'bab par gyur ro// phunasum tshogs par gyur ba rnams kyang ston ka khrid pa dang 'grib pa'i sgo
nas chu chung bar 'gyur ro// de khonabazhan du dbyar gyi mtshan mo char bab par gyur pa dang mtshungs pa ni phun sum tshogs b rnams yin// dbyar char 'gags par gyur nas ston gyi
dusan chu klung rnams khrodacing 'grib pa'i sgo nasamatshungs bani rgud pa rnams yin no// dgun gyi dusazhand med pa ma yin pas khurab rnams dngamatshungs ban phun sum tshogs pa rnamA
ba[/ ]yin no/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi dngos bo bad+ma rnams kyangs ka'i dus na rgyas par 'gyur zhing nad med dang bung ba rnams kyis kyang ston par byed do// dgun gyi dus na ni kha ba dung bad
dag la bung ba rnams kyang nags bstan no// so ka'i dus kyis pad+ma de kho na bzhin nad mad pa yin no// dgun gyi dus dang mtshungs par gyur bani nad med pa ma yin pa'o// de bzhin du
soms can 'di dag rnams kyang byed pas shin tu rnam par nyams par gyur nas bdag nyid kyi rgyud b rnams ni go tan rig par mi 'gyur ro// des mtho bor brtsigs pa'iri'i nags dang/ nya
ba'i zhogs dang/ ljon shing 'bab chudang/ khrus kyi rdzi debudang/ ni'u gsing dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ ri dwags dang/ bya ba dang/ ri khrod dang/ chung la dang bcas
pa rnams la legs par bltas par gyur bas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyogrol la yang dag bar ltabar byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes
sul zhing gnas ban ) des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyisasam/ lha'i mig gis byang phyogs sgra mi snyanan dga' ba dang/ dga' ba'i 'og so su gyur pa dang/ dga' ba'i ri'i 'phrang
ba'adzin pazhes byabagazhan yodapa mthong// ri bo de ni rnam par bkra ba'i 'phrang ba rnams 'dzin pa yin bas/ dmar bo dang/ sngon po dang/ dkar bo dang/ mthe ba dang/
khyu/ gsar brodang/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams 'dras pa'i mdog gi kha dog dang yang ldan pa'i ljon shing gi rigs rnams yod do// 'di lta sta/ sta ba ka'i shing dang/
nganamod ba dang/ gsar gyi lamadang ldan pa dang/ 'khri shing gal bas g.yogs par gyur ba rnamasaso// 'dilta sta/ shin tu grol bar gyur ba'i 'khri shing rnams drung/ dag ba/
ba'i lim dang/ rlung gi shugs kyis rab tu g.yoba'i lo ma rnams so// 'di lta ste/ shingani rtsal dang/ brgyud+ma'i 'dabamadang/ chu la skyes ba dang rnamasaso/ 'di lta ste/
brgya la cung khrod dang/ bduga'i 'dab ma dang/ nyim mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams so/ 'o de lta ste/ til kAs dang/ zla ba'i 'od kyis dga' ba dang rnams so// 'di lta ste/
ku mu ta'i sgrog sa dang/ rtsom 'bo ba dang rnams so// 'di lta ste/ dubasu 'dod pa dang/ zla ba phyadab dang bcas pa na dga' ba dang rnams so// 'dilta sta/ ut+pal mtshanamo dga'
ba'o/ 'di lta sta/ ban dU dzApa'i kAdang/ de'i rjes thogs pa la 'bras bu 'byung ba dag go/ 'di lta ste/ amudang/ duba'i dris lhag par bsgos pa dag go/ 'ad lta sta/ mya na
mdasngon po dang/ rig b.rab zod pa dgago/ 'di lta sta/ kun dA dang/ shin tu 'jam pa rnams so/ 'di lta ste/ sho ri Tathadang/ gom ba bor bar bzod pa dag go/ 'di lta ste/
ka soms dang drobs dga' bar 'gyur ba'i dri'i/ 'di lta ste/ kung sum dang/ ku su many+tsadang/ yul gzhan du rnam pa'i rgyu ba rnams so// 'di lta ste/ ko bi dA rAdang/ bzang bo
mthong ba dag go/ 'di lta ste/ yid bde ba dang lha'i skyabo rnams dga' bgro/ 'di lta ste/ nil ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ pad+mamatsho skyes dang dus thams cad kyi mdog can rnam
so/ 'dit+tasta/ song gsuphrudang/ ka dam pa dag pa dgago/ 'di lta ste/ chus dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ rkang pa'i mthil gyis brgyab bsam tog 'byung ba'o/ 'di lta sta/ rgya
ngan med pa dang/ rang bzhi'i gyis dro dang/ kha dog rnams dga' bar gyurar/ 'di lta ste/ a Ta kadang sa/ de ltar dedag rnams ji ltar gtso bor gyur ba'i ljon shing me tog gis
byug pa rnams yongs su bsgrags pa yin te/ me tog gi ljon shing gi rigs nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te/ 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i ri bo'i nye 'khor rnams na lanatshun du bskyod pas ko drab
rnams 'khril bar gyur pa'i ljon shing rnams yin no// dung gi rags kyi tshogs rnams kyis nyabar gang ba yin te/ bung ba de dag rnams kyang la la ba zlumu'i mdog yon/ la la ni
gsar gyi mdog go/ kha cig ni dpu la gyi mdog tu rnam par snang ngo// kha cig ni gur kum gyi ma dog go/ kha cig ni sngon pog/ kha cig ni rnam par 'dres par gyur ba'o// kha cig ni mtsho
la rgya ba'o// kha cig na ljon shing bsgruba'o// kha cig ni shing ga la ba las rgyu'o// kha cig nithams cad la rgyu ba'o// bya rnams kyang ba ni gsar 'bab pa'i lus dang

dngu'agyimadog gi sgro'o// kho ciga'i dngul gyi lus la gser gyi sgro// kha cig nib du ma'i lus la biT+Tama'i sgro'o// kha cig ni bsgyur dang 'dra par gyur pa'i lus la in+d+hanI la'i sgro rnams go// kha
zla cig sha'agyi mdog gi lus la sgro rnams gsar gyi sgo'i 'dabazhin no// kha cig nirin bochagasum gyi lus sugyur pa 'di lta ste/ lus zhi gsar gyi mdog go/ sgo rnams ni dngul gyi mdog
ka go/ rgyab nab ma'i mdog go/ khacig ni na bo cha bdun gyi mdog gis bya rnams la 'di lta sta/ an+danIl dang/ marata dang/ 'gal dang/ chu sa 'garbadang/ bdum dang/ su
ku mA ri kA dang/ pad+ma rA ga'i mdog rnamasaso// de ltar rang gi las kyi rnam par bkrab 'i lus canarnames yin te/ gzugs rnam pa du mar gyur pa'i bung ba rnams dang/ bya rnams
kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sgro dang ldan pa dang/ rjes su 'thun pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skad rjod par byed pa yin no// 'as sna tshogasab rnams kyis lus rnam par bakra ba'agyur pa
yin no///bdog dang 'phreng ba dang ldan pa'i ma tog dum rnams 'byungab yang 'di ltaste/ gzugs du ma rnamA yin no// skyes bu rnams kyis rang gis las byas par gyur pa'i rangabazhin
ji lta ba bzhin no// ljon shing rnams kyang gzugs dang dri sna tshogs pa yin zhing/ byang phyob sa sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi dbang gi shing rgyun rgyu dang/ rdo ba dang/ chuklung dang/ khrus kyi
rdzingabu rnams kyang rnam pa dumar dga' bar gyur pa dwang/ yid la smon pa'azhinapurnag khar bkab yod/ sngon legs par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gyis rin po che rnams
dang yang ldan pa dang/ zas skom gyi chu bo rnams kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ shing ljon shing dga' bar gyur pa dang/ sa'i nye 'khor gyi cha de dang de dgo rnams byang phyogs sgra mi snyazha/

ba'i skyes bu rnams rtsa dga' bar byed do/ 'a phrang ba 'dzin pa'i ri chu'akhor rnams na rab tu gnas pa'i skyes bu gang yin pa de dag rnams la rtag tu 'gying bag can zhes bya ba'i ming 'byung bar 'gyur
ro 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i nye 'khor gang la skyes bu gang dag 'gying bar byed pa de na 'gying bag can yin te/ ji ltar yongasasu 'dusabartol gyi rtsa ba na lha rnams kyidabyar zla ba bzhi po rnams ma
gtogs pa dang/ lha rnams lamig 'dzum pa med pa dang/ shadang/ rus pa dang/ chus ra dang/ pagasab mdapa rnams dang/ 'di dag rnamasam gtogs ba rnams dang/ byang
phyogs sgra mi snyan gyi skyes bu rtas//tu 'gying bag can rnams ni thams cad kyang mtshungs pa yin no// gzhan yang rnala'abyor spyod pa pa las dang chos la yang dag b.rakun tu lta bar byed de/
sems can de dag rnams ni rgyags pa rnam pa gsum gyis rgyags par gyur nas legs par spyod pa rnams spyod pa'am byed do// 'di lta ste/ 'khrugs kyis rgyags pa/
dung/ lang tsho'i rgyugs ba dang/ gson pa'i rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags par gyur ba'i phyir na/ lus kyis legs par spyad pa rnams mi spyod do// ngag gis legs par spyad pa rnams
mi spyod do// yid kyis legs par spyad pa rnams mi spyod do// legs pa byas pa'i las kyi lhag ma rnams kyis lha rnams su skya'o// lha'i 'jig rten de las shi 'a bos ba'igyur nas/
dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ dud 'grodang/ mi rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir srid pa'i dug gi mchog zas dang 'dres pa yin pa'i phyir sems can rnams la mchog tu rtsa ba ba
dang/ 'ching ba dang/ mchog tu nyam nga ba yin no// des bcings pa'i phyir na sams can 'dra deg rnams kyi ni ngas ba kho nar sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dag kun tu mi shes pa yin
no// mngar ba'i mchog tugyur pa la 'bras bu rtswa ba pa 'dod pa rnams shAms cad ni ki/ma bka sman ba dang gdub dang/ sa'og gisazhags pa dang 'dra yin pa de dag sems can gyis ma rig go/
g.yang dang 'dra ba dang thams cad kyang rnam par 'dral ba dang/ 'chab 'i sdug bsngal ba dang/ sdug bsngal rnams la yang dab med pa yin no/ ri chen po'i 'bab chu'i shugs ltarag yo ba
yin pas lang tsho yang ra de na rtag ma yin te/ brtan pa dang yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyis gnas skabs gcig kyang 'gro ba ldan yong ba ma yin no/ 'di ltar nyis pa byas pa las/

kyi 'khor lo'i rlung gis yang dang yang du 'khor bar gyur du zin kyang srog chags 'di dag rnams ni skyo ba yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i ri dang nye 'khor gyi skyes bu rtag tu 'gying
bgo can rnags la yang yang dag par bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la lta bar byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol lus kyis lus la
rjes su lta zhing gzhus te/ byang phyogs sgrag snyan na mi'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ chu klung gi ri'i/sasu gyur ba 'am/ khrus kyi rdzing bu'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ gang yin pa de dag
dpa' bdang/ shin tu dag pa dang/ mchog du dga' bar gyur ba gzhan dag zhe na/ deshos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mgo gis mthong bar gyur pa byang phyogs sgrami
snyan na shin tu dka' bar gyur pa'i mi'i rigs gzhan dag kyang yod do// 'di lta ste/ dus nadagarab zhesabya ba'i ri bo rgyar dpag tshad stong yo pa/ mthor dpag tshad sum cu par gyur pa'o//
dal yang dus drug po 'di dag rnams nyidartag tu rta bar gnas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dgun stod dang/ dgun smad dang/ sos ka dang/ dpyod dang/ dbyar dang/ ston la sogs pa'o//
ri de ladul phyogs 'di dag dang/ dgun stod ni gang dag yin zhing la yang dgun stod skya ba'i ljon shing gi me tog rab tu rgyas pa la/ rnams yin zhe na/ de la dgun stod
rgya ba'i ljon shing gi rigs rnams 'di lta ste/ sArishing kAn dang/ bro bdang/ bad kyis rgas pa dang/ bung ba brjod par byed pa dang/ nges pa radri zhim pa dang/ mu gu med pa dang/
tsakrapAkAs rjes su sgra sgrogs pa dang/ mchog tu dga' bar gyur pa'am tog/dang/ klu thunasumatshogs pa dang/ thab kor skyes pa dang/ nitanatanadang/ mchog tu khrod ba dang/
mdang bcas pa dang/ ma tog bco lnga po de dag rnams ni de sun stod kyi dus su ste/ dgun stod skya b rnams yin no// dus na dga' ba'i ri bo'i 'u la phyogs gnyis pa lan dgunasmad kyi dus su/
'byung ba rnams yin no// de la ma tog gi rigs 'di dag rnams dusasu dga' ba'i ri la dgun smad kha 'bya ba yin te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyanu rnams kyi 'byung phyogs sgrumi snyan rnams sa/
kyi dbang gis 'bras bu yin no// dus na dag 'a ba'i yul phyogs gzhan pa'i so ka'i dus su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la me tog gi rigs ni 'di dag rnams yin no// 'di lta sgyu/ shi tu
khabyang dang/ pad+madang/ kur ba kang dang/ dri ma nga ba dang/ bung ba 'khor ba dang/ samo ma ta dang/ mya ngan med dang/ king shu ka dang/ mya ngan 'dasngon po dang/ 'grib ba med pa'i
dridang/ ku mu da dang/ a mu kang dang/ klung du skye ba dang/ ldan pa dang/ ni tsati dang/ la chu dang/ bAn ta ti kang drang/ me tog la bya dga' ba dang/ rtag tu ma tog kha byab dang/
'dab ma stong ba dang rnams yin no// nyi shu bo 'di dag rnams ni so ka'i dus su yin te/ yu tika dang dus su rgyu ba ra ma tog gi rigs rnams kyang yin no// dus su dag kha ba'i ri'i yul phyogs
gzhan lan de byed kyi ma tog gi rigs 'di dag rnams 'byung ngo// 'di lta ste/ tsam pa ka dang/ su man sa dang/ gsar gyi yu ti ka dang/ dusan rgyu ba dang/ du bas grol ba'i dritong
pad+ma dang ) bung ba gnas pa dang/ pa sa sam dang/ shA ta ti dang/ usrung dang/ drimanyam ba dang/ dri rtag pa dang/ zas kyi ro dang/ rlung gi 'debs pa dang/ 'dab ma
brgya pa dang/ ta mi'irodang/ nyi ma byed pa dang/ tshulA lan dang/ ti la'i dngos po'i mdog dang/ byis pa'i ma tog dang/ dza til dang rnams te/ me tog gi rib/sa nyi shu po de dag
rnams ni dpyid kyi dus na kha byang n+te/ byang phyogs sgra ma snyan pa rnams kyis legs par byas pa'i las kyi dbang gis dus na dga' ba'i ri bo la dpyod kyi dus na yin no// dus na dga' pa'i
pa'i sa phyogs gzhan dag rna'as la ni ri dbya' gyim tog 'di dag rnams 'byung ste/ 'diltar lang ka ta ka dang/ kuT dzang dang/ brgya 'gro ba dang/ sa la 'gying zhing dga' bar gyur pa
dang dar ra phreng ba dang/ rdo las skyes ba dang/ ka dam pa la dga' ba dang/ badrar 'khor ba dang/ me tog dri zhim pos dag re ba dang/ zangs kyi ro dang/ sa la
la dang/ tsan tra dIka dang/ klung du skyes pa dang/ rtsamo mtho ba dang rnams te/ ston kyang ma tog gi rigasanyi shu po de drag rnams 'byung ba yin no// de la dusanadaga' pa'i'i bo la de ltar de dag

phasgyu rnams dus drug tu yin zhing nye 'khor rnams na yang dus kyis 'khor lo sta/ dadus de dag rnams kyi de srid du byang phyogs sgromisAn rtag ba kho nar dga' bar gyur pa'i mi tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/
du ma'i 'bras bu dang/ ljon shing dang/ khrus kyi rdzingabu dang/ chu klung gi so rnams kyis kyang dus su dga' ba'i rabodi ltar dga' bar gyur ba yin no// de bzhin dugazhan dag rnams kyang dus
rnams la de ltar yin pa ni sngar bzhinano// dus na dag 'a ba'i ri'i nyil ba'on gnas bar gyur ba'i skyesabu de dag rnams ni da ri ring ba zhes byaba'i ming du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor sbyod pa
las kyi chos la kun tu lta bar byed de/ jiltar sems can 'di dag rnams sngon legs bar byas ba rnams 'du bar byed ba yin pa dang/ gsar ba rnams kyang mibyed ba yin la/ de dag rnams ni
so so'amangon par shes par yang m yin no// ji ltar dusatshod kyi 'khor lo rnams 'khor bar gyur ba'i dus na skyes bu 'di dag rnams kyi tshi kun nas gcodapar byed pa yin no// dus kyi mes tsho'i
[z]shing rnams srog bar byed do// dus kyi rdo rjes tsha'i tog rnams 'joms par byed do// dus kyis nga gas skyes bu ri dag 'a rnams rab tu bcom nas bla bar byed do// 'chib dag dus ni chu bo dang
mtshungs pas skyes bu'i ljon shing rnams mngon par bsdus shing bskyod nas 'joms par byedago/ dus ni sbyang ku dang mtshungs pa dang sprul dang mtshungs pa'i phyir na/ skyes bu rnams gsod par

byed do// 'chi bdagazhiglang bo che dang 'dra bas rtsa ka tapa dang mtshungs ba'i khamagyi mid par byedado// 'chi bdag ni rlung dang mtshungs pas skyes bu'i ljon shing rnams rtsa ba nas 'gyel par byed do//
skye bo rnams thams cad kyis kyang snang ba ma zhus pa'i 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa de dag rnams skyes bu rnams kyis ci'i phyi'i kun tu'u gtogs pa yin/ gang gis lang tsho la bab po rnams thams
cad b yang co 'dri bar byed pa dang/ stobs rnams thams cad 'jig bar byed pa dang/ skye bo rnams thams cad kyi bzhad gad du byed pa'i rgas pa yang mthong ba ma yin na rten nyam chung bar byed pa
dang/ mi ga dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid rnams dang nye bar 'gal par byed pa dang/ kha chu rnam par 'dzag par byed pa dang/ sgyur por byed pa dang/ 'gram
pa dang/ so dang/ rtsod pa dang/ tshigs pa dang/ gzhad dang/ rgyus pa rnams nyams par byed pa dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i gnas rnams la gag ga byed pa por gyur pa// lang tshol bab pa
rnams thams cad la 'granazlaragyur ba/ lang tshol bab pa rnams thams cad kyang kha nyan pa ba sa' gyur pa/ 'chibadag rgyal bo'i grong khyer du 'jug par byed pa po/ dgal
stobs dang spro ba rnams 'jig par byed pa bo/ sgra snyoms dga' bar gyur pa'i sa pa/ snabs dang/ gcinadang/ rtog pa rnamasamang bar gyur pa/ rtag tu yang mal stanal lhag par snyom
sh+tsa las su byed pa bor gyur ba/ sams can bag med pa 'di dag rnams kyis 'i sbyor ma mthong/ gang gis tsho'ajig bar gyur ba'i nad kyi 'jig pa yangs par 'jige par gyur bas shin tu
bar gnas yin te/ desan khamasa rnams 'khrug par byed pa dang/ dbang bo rnams thams cad kyang longs spyod par byed pa dang/ rgyus pa dang/ rkang mar dang/ bcud dang/ bag kha dang
zi khrag dang/ shadang tshol dang/ rus pa dang// kha chu dang rnams thams cad kyang kun skams par byed pa dang ( khu ba rnams thams cad kyi 'granang ba'i dgrar gyur pa dang/ langs par
bya bdang/ legs bar 'dug pa yang mi bzod pa sman pa dang/ sman pa la bltos nas bzlog par bya ba bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ ba ldog pa dang/ myang bar bya ba la sogs pa rnams
thams cad kyang mi gtsang ba lta bu r gyur pa ( deb dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ gnyid phal che bar 'gyur te/ pags pa dang/ rus pa tsam dang/ rgya bo thams cad rang gi skye bo dang/ grogs

mkho dang/ nya 'brel dang/ bu dang chung ma dang bcas pa'achi bdag dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa'i nad kyi 'jig bas bdag nyid byi bar 'gyur bar rtog pa yin no// rnal 'byor spyod pa de skyes bu
bal yod par gyur ba de dag rnams la rjes su brtsa bar 'gyur 'o// brtse ba'agyur pas kyang 'di'i tshangs pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul du gyur ba rnams la 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/
dga' ba'o// de ltar rnal 'byor sbyod pa des byang phyogs sgra mi snyan ba'i rgyu sa bu bag med pas gnas par gyur pa'i sams can rnams la rjes su brtsi bar byed do// 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ni shin tu
dman pa min par mthong ngo// lci ba dang chu'i chu bur ltabur gyur pa'i lus la kun tu lta bar byed do// sgyum lta bu r gyur ba'i rnam pa shes pa la shes kyis kun tu lha par byed do// rmi lam
gyis nad dang 'dra bar gyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams la kun tu lta bar byed do// nges bar kho ra ga 'di'i byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa phyi 'gyi lus kyis lus la rjes
su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra misnyanan ra'i rigs sam/ tshuklung gi rogs pas/ sngon ga nga gi 'i bags su gyur po dga' ba dang/ shin tu dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' bar
gyur pa ci zhin/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba byang gi sgra mi snyan rigazhan kun dga' ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba dpag tshad stong
yod do/ ri kun dag 'ba'adzin pa'i nye 'khor nani/ rgyu'athun bzhes bya ba'i nags dpag tshad lnga pa yod do// nags de nan 'byung khungs rnams thams cad dang ldan no/
de la 'a byung khungs 'di dag rnams yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gsaragyi 'byung khungs dang/ dngul gyi 'byung khungs dang/ zasakyi 'byung khungs dang/ chang ga 'byung khungs dang/ sbrang rtsi'i 'byung
khungs dang/ ro drug gi 'byung khungs dang rnams te/ 'byung khungs de dag dang gzhan dag rnams kyang de dag la yod pa yin no// rgyu 'thun pa'i skye 'khor rnams ni dug 'bar gyur pa yinate/ gang la
tshadang mtshungs par gyur pa'i ljon shing rnams la ni ma rtogo gi 'khri shing rnams kyis yongs subaskor ba 'gyur ba dang/ gsar gyi 'dab ma'i rdzing bu rnams kyin dengul gyi yu ba can yin no/ dngul
gyi 'dabal la ni gsar gyi yu ba can yin no/ gsar dang dngul gyi 'dabam rnams lan bat+tA'i yu ba can rnams te/ nyin sharam thog ltar dmar ba'i pad+ma rnams kyis khyab par gyur pa'i pad+ma'i
rdzing bu de dag rnams la bya sna tshogs pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o// 'di lta ste/ ngong pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ bA ka dang/ mtsho'i khrung khrung dang/ ka dam pa dang/ ri dgas kyi mgrin
kha dang chu bya dang/ ma ta b+ha ba blabAdang/ tsakrab ka dang/ ba lu dang/ ar+ya: dang/ sa ra sA dang/ bi lA lAtsadang/ dus su rjod par byed pa dang ( u rnab ro ba dang/

mtshan mo rgyu ba dang/ bats+tsha'i rdul la dga' ba dang/ sinad+ha'i rlabs dang/ rlabs las skyes pa dang sta/ bya'i gas nyi shu bo de dag rnams pad+ma'i rdzing bu de na yod do// rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i zhig

kyi nyo 'khor de las gnatu 'dras nas kun dga' ba 'dzin pa'i ri'i phyid du 'gyurab na dpag tshad brgya yin te/ de la 'od ma'i klung na nges par gnas zhes bya ba ri skyes bu rnams yod go/ gang dag kha sar gyi

'ang bzhin du gyur pa'i ljon shing gi tshogs na de dag glu len par byed pa na yang nam mkha' gnas nas lta ba bu mo rnams kyang nyin bar byed do/ chu klung dang/ mtsho'u dang/ taba'i nags dang/ byarnam+ba
kyang phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni yul 'di la yang sngar gyis bzhinano/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod ba pas sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/
sams can 'di dag rnams 'du bar byar yod pal klu len par byed do// ci'i phyir 'di dog rnamasamamathong pa yin no// bag med pas na ba'i rgyuba'i phyi'i dmyal ba ba rnams su ni du par 'gyur/
ba yin na/ kun tu go ba dngam yin no// srid pa 'azhigs pa'i 'ching bsabacings par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gang yin pa de rnamA/
byad do/ de'i rnam par smin pa rnams nicu ba ba yin pas dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ba'i 'grob yon bsayang/
@#/ sosadang/ thig nag dang/ bsdus 'jogs dang/ du'abod chen po dang/ tshab dang/ ratu tshaba'i dmyalaba rnams su ngu ba dang/ lhang kyog rnam pa sna tshogs/
ba rnams kyis mngon par 'dzems par byed do// 'dod pa'i sgradang/ reg bya dang/ ro dang/ gzugs dang/ dri'i srid pa rnam pa lngas kun nas nyo bar ba cings nas sngon gyi mtha' dang/
wA phyi ma 'i mtha' lasams can gyis rgya mtsho 'khor ba yan no// deltar rnal 'byor spyod pa pas 'od ma'i klung la nges pa ra gnas pa'i skyes bu rnams la kun du bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji
ltar bzhin du phyi rol gyi lus la lta bar byed do// gzhan yang cha la 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus rjes su lta shingaganas to/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan na dga' ba ma/ ches dga' bar
gyur ba gzhan ci zhe nu/ des thos pa las byung ba'ishes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa byang phyogs sgra mi snyanan ri gzhan yang yod de/ yid kyis rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya
pa'i'i dpag tshad na stong du gyur pa yin no// ri de'i dga' bar gyur ba ni 'am ci mo rnams kyis rtagapa khonar glu len par byed pa yin te/ ri'i rtse mo rnams dang/ nags rnams dang/ ta ba'i
zhugs rnams dang/ ri'i ngos rnams dang/ ri phug rnams dang/ rdzing bu rnams dang/ shing kota ka'i nags rnams dang/ klu'i nag kun nga rnams dang/ nA ri ke la'i nags rnams dang/
bshang panasa'i nags rnams dang/ khu ru ra'i nags rnams dang/ a mra'i nags rnams dang/ chu shing gi nags rnams dang/ gser gyi dpal 'bras kyi shing gi nagasa rnams dang/
ka yid ta'i nags rnams dang/ rmabya'i nags rnams dang/ khu byug gi zhags rnams dang/ ne tso'i nags kyi nang rnams dang/ chu klung dang/ khrus kyi rdzing bu dang/ nying nags rnams dang
pad+ma'il rnams dang/ ut+pa la'i tshal rnams dang/ sin du ba ra'i nags rnams dang/ grub pa'i nags rnams dang/ cu ta'i zhags rnams dang/ kurala'i nagasarnamasadang/ gson
pa gson pa'i nags rnams dang/ tanaTa'i nags rnams dang/ rdzing bu dga' ba'agyur ba rnams la thams cad kyang rin po che'i sgra snyan pa yang dag par ldan pa skya bo rnams thums cad kyi
rna bar yang snyan pa'i 'gyurab/ srodaba'i la gyis mnan nas gyur pa'i byis pa'i blo can rnams la chung slar yang brgya 'gyur dusrad pa'im kun tu 'bar ba 'gyurab r mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis
glu len par byed do// de dag gi sgra dbyangs kyis ri dgas rnams kyang sgra 'byin par byed do// lhan cig spyod par gyur ba'i bya'i tshogs rnams kyang lhan cig tu rtsa dga' bar byed do// bdud rtsir
rtag tu rung ba'i 'bras bu rnams kyang legs par mid par byed do// bung ba rnams kyang rtsi dag 'thungabar byed do// rig pa 'dzinakha rnams dang lha ribu mo rnams kyang namamakha' la'og
@#// nas nyan par byed do// de ltar yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i ri lami'am mo de dag rnams kyis dga' zhingasAn pa yin no// 'di'i nyo 'khor rnamasan yang bama'i 'od bzhi
shadang/ gsar gyi brag dang/ dngul gyi rdodang/ bi dru ma ljonang shing dang/ mu tig gi bye ma dang/ byu ru'i rkang bu rnams dang/ shel gyi rdob dang/ dung gi rkang bu 'jam bo rnams dang
gsar gyi bapa'i rdzing bu rnams la dang ba rnams kyis nye b.ram ngos bar byas pa dang/ lus rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i ri de gas rnams dang/ koka la'i sgradang bcas pa'i
nags dang/ rnabya dang/ shang shang te'u gyis sgra rnams snyan ba rnams dang/ khrus kyi rdzo dbun bung ba'i sgra snyan par gyur ba rnams te/ de ltar yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i ri'i rig pa ba
yin no/ skya bo rnams thums cad kyi mig dang rna bar sdugacing san pa yin no// thams cad du yang rab tu dga' ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ la ba dang/ rtsabarubyed pa dang/ yongs su spyod pa dang
mi khos mos dang/ bya'i tshogs rnams kyis kyang yid bde bar byed pa yin no/ ri rab lhun po gnyis pa lta bu r gyur pa dpag tshad nyis stong 'khong du'o// mtho ba'i yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i
da'i 'od kyis dpag tshad nyis stong du mdog skya bor byed do// be cha chu'i bod kyi gzi brjid kyis gsar gyi mdog dang/ ljon shing sdon bo rnams kyang nyo bakhor bcom nas ri skya bor byed do// dpe ran
ri rab lhun po'i gser mdog bzang bo'i gzi brjid kyis rtswa rnams thams cad kyang gsar bzhin du ba gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ yid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i ri'i gzi brjid kyis kyang thams cad skya bor
'gyur/ ri degs dang/ bya dang/ chudang/ mtshe'u dang/ chu klung dang/ ljon shing dang/ bda rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa zhi'i 'di la yang sngar gyi bzhin no// ribo yid kyi rjes
su 'thun pa'i nye 'khor na skyes bu dag rab tu gnas pa de dag rnams ni/ 'isnang ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// skya bor snang ba'i skye bo rnams ni gzi brjid cheb dang/ gzugs chen po dang
ldan padang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ mchogatu mdzes pa dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ phye ma dang/ dri dang/ byug pa dang/ rgod pa dang/ 'gying bag dang/ gar dang/ glu dang
rol mo'i sgra dang rnams la dga' bar gyur pa dang/ phan tshun phrag dog pa dang/ ser sna'i drima rnams nye bar bcom pa dang/ bdag gi ba med ring rgyalamed pa dang/ skya bor snang ba'i skyes
ba rnams thams cad nyidakyang 'phreng ba dang/ phyag dang/ dri dang/ byug pa rnams kyis lus brgyan pa min no// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra dang/ gludang/ dri khro'i sgra rnams
kun tu rjod par byed pa'i chos dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi thams cad nyid dga' bar byed do// yid la smon pa 'a natu bsam pa rnams kyang gang dang gang dag yid la sems par byed pa de rnams
kun de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ mal tags pa'i gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i do shal rnams dang/ de la 'os bar
shigyur ba'irnam pa sna tshogs pa 'irgyan rnam dang/ nyal pa 'ag/ rab tu sad pa 'gyur ba na yang thos na dga' bar 'gyur ba/ yid du 'ong ba las kyang yid du 'ong ba'agyur pa'i sgrom
'dus pa rnams rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya brgya stong du ma rnams kyis sgrogs par byed do// rigs brgya phrag du ma'i bad+ma'i rdzi bu rnams kyis dri zhim po rnams kyang rtag tu sgom par
byed do: skya bor snang ba'i skyes bu rnams kyis de ltar bgrang po'i las kyi 'bras bu sprul pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar byed do// de bzhin du dman ba dang/ bar ma dang/ mchog tu
legs par byas ba rnams kyang rinano// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las kyi rnam par smin pa la rjes su lta bar byed do/ kyamaji ltaran sems can 'di dag rnams kyis le grwa
par byas pa'i las khrod pa rjes su ma mthong ba yin/ 'di dag rnams kyis mngon sum du ma gyur ba yin nam zhe na/ ji ltar skyo ba'i sdug bsngal ni dang po nyid du ma dang pha gnyis kyi khu chu
dang khrag de dag gnyis kyis mi stong par gyur ba'i gcin gyisanang du bsus pa'i smad kyis rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam pa zhing gi gdubakor lta bu'i mngal du skye ba rnam par shes pa'i sa bon
