[/]skya'o de yang las kyis rlung gis bu snod kyi bskor bar gyur pas nyi ga 'dun pa la mar mar por 'gyur ro// srog gcod pa sangs nas mar mar po gyur pa de la gnas pa na yang rnam par/
'ashas ba'im de kho'o// nyin bdunub gzhan la ni gor gor por 'gyur ro// rnam par shes ba lang las dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang gis de nyid la rmongs pas gnas so// de la
gnas ba nyid kyang nyi ma bdun yin te/ nyi ma bdunan sha'i gong bur 'gyur ro// gcin dang stug pa'i tshogs rnams kyang ma'i gsus pa'i smad du yin zhing/ gang drang gang dag ma'i bya ba'agyur
ba lus rnam par bskyod pa dang/ bas kyis byas ba nags rung ste/ de dang de dag rnams nyid kyi 'di gzir bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gtun shing gi bu ram gyis shing 'tsher ba'i byed pa de lta mal
na gnas pa 'tshir bar byed do// gzhan yang las kyi rlung ri ga'i gong bu drad par gyur par smom bod 'gyuraro/de las ni rdog rdog lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chung ba zad/nyis kyi dang/ bga'
gnyis kyi dang/ mgo'i ko/ gzhan yang las kyi rlung gis bskor bar gyur pas mngal nas skyo ba ni ma'i gsus bar 'byung bar gyur la ( de las kyang lteb dusu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
gru gu de ni ma'i ma kha la ma'i nang nas 'byung bar gyur ko/ gang yang gang ba dang/ drob dang/ robazang ba dang/ ro ngan po rnams kyang rung ste/ mas zas zos pa'i ro yang de yang d la spu
la barmadabya// gu de nas 'jug go/ lte panas zas kyi ro gang yin pa des mngal na gnas pa 'dikun tu 'tsho bar byed do// de ltar mngal gyis byas pa'i shin tu sdug bsngal ba dang
khyad par dubartsog ba rnags nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ dogal tem lan gnas panadus byed par ma gyur nani gcin dang khrag gis gnas skabs na gnas pa na/ dol khrums cad
sgyu rdzogs bar gyur nas zla ba bcu na lhur ma mig gi nang nas 'dren pas/ bur shing ltar yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'tshir bar gyur pas ma'i skye gnas nas 'byung ba yin no//
skyes nus kyang rlung dang tshabs 'og par gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi mchog rnams nyamasasu myongabar 'gyur ro// skyes bar gyur nas kyang mas 'di bor nas gar 'dod pa'i kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur
ro/de yang bdag nyid kyi mtheb mo nu bar byed du/ de las 'om 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des kyang bdag nyid 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de ltar dus de nyid kyi tshe na byis ba yin te/ lhagos pas
na lang tsho la reg par 'gyur ro// de dag rnams ni dus kyi rlung gis nges par b tapa pa yazhin/ des na sems can de dag rnams las kyis bgo skal la spyod par byed pa dang/ las kyis
skye gnas par gyur pa dang/ las pa rtan bar byas pa rnams bzhete/ dag ba 'am mde'abar gyur pa rnams kyang rung sta/ ji ltar las byas bar gyur pa'i las de dang de dag rnams kyis
skal ba can du 'gyur ba yin no/ 'on kyang skyes bu de dag rnams kyis ni las dang rnam par smin pa rnams mngon sum du mthong ba yang g yin no/ kye ma kyi hud bag med par rnam pa ra/
rgyuba'i sems can bde dag rnams ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba yin te/ gang gi phyi'i sdug bsngal gyis mchog tu gyur pa'i ljon shing rnams kyis rtsa ba yang skye ba yin no// skya ba yod par gyur
na tshab dang/ srang ba dang/ rtogs pa dang/ skom pa dang/ la ba dang/ nyam chung ba dang/ mi mthun ba dang phrad pa dud/ mthun ba bral ba dang rgas pa dang rgud pa'i tshor ba rnams
kyang 'byung bar 'gyurago/ khakhor ba sdug bsnga la bu ya du 'byung bar gyur bas skyes pa yin// 'khor ba 'di ni phun sum tshogs ba dang rgyud pa'i phyang mo nyug pa la zhon pa yin no/ 'khor ba
'di ni lo rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong khang/ bdag med pa yin no// ji ltar ri rnams dang/ nags dang/ shang shongadang bcas pa rnams dang/ nags dang/
taba'i rtags dang/ chu klung dang/ ljon shing drang/ bya dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ ri'i khrod dang/ ga yang ka dang/ rin po tshodang 'di dag rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba
yin na/ byang phyogs sgratsho snyan pa'i skyes bu 'di dag rnams kyis ci'i phyir na ma go/ mya ngan dang bral bas 'gyur ba dang/ dus kyis mthar la ni thams cad kyang thal bar 'gyur ro// byang phyog
[p]// sgra mi snyan gyi gling 'di yang stongs par 'gyur ro// skyes bu 'di dag rnams thams cad kyang dus byas pa gyur nas/ lha'i 'jig rten du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/
denas 'di dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro rnams su rgya bar 'gyur te/ rang gi las kyis bgo skal la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa pa des las kyi 'bras
bu rnam par smin pa rnams rjes su mthong bar gyur ba skya bor snang ba'i skyes bu rnams la rjes su brtse ba skye bar 'gyur go/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyidan ngan pa yin pa ra mthong ngo// gzhan yad
rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjesasu lta zhing gnas te/ gzhan yang byang phyogs sgram snyan na dga' ba ma/ ches dga' bar gyur pa yod dam zhe na/ des zos pa las

byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'imig gis mthong bar gyur pa pad+ma ku shesha ya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ri'i// pad+ma ku shesha ya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ri dpag tshad stong du gyur pa la chu

bsal ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu dpal/tshad ldabargya ba yod da/ gsar gyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i bad+ma khyab par gyur pa 'dam med pa bung ba dang/ ngang pa dang/ kican Ti ba dang/
tsakra pAka rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no// pad+ma'i rdzing bu don yang lha'im tog pad+ma kun ngasha ya dang/ lha'i man+da ra ba dang/ ku su ma dang/ ljon shing dang/ lo tog
dang 'bras bu dang/ tshulhung drung/ rikhrod dang/ bya dang/ nags dang/ rta ba'i zhogs dang/ rdzi deb dga' ba 'gyur pa rnams dang/ bsal ba'i chu rnams ni sngar gyi bzhin no//
bad ga u dang ldan pa'iri'i khyadatu gyur 'dab gatshad lnga brgyal mchog turaga' bar gyur ba'i gzhal yas khang stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yod do// 'di lta ste/ gsar dang/
dngul gyi rang bzhin rnams lan gser gyi stegs bu dang ldan no// shel gyi rang bzhin rnams lanibazhuma'i stobs budang ldan no 'dzum+ma'i rang bzhin nas sa lanIshal gyi stogs budang
ldan no// en+danI la'i radabazhin rnams la ni chus ra ga wa'i stagasakhu dang ldan no// mus rag lnga'i ringabazhin rnams la ni in+donAla'i snyogs du dang ldan no// de bzhin du phan tshunangu rnamakha
sna tshogs pa'i rtags du mas kyis legs par brgyan pa dang/ dril bu g.yar ka'i drabs kun tu g.yogs pa dang/ gludang/ gar dang/ rgod pa dang/ rje sgra rab tu sgrogs bar
byod dang/ rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang/ rgun 'bu'i chu klung rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ nags dang nyo ba'i nags rnams kyis legs par khyab par gyur pa yin te/
dper bya ba na lha rnams kyi grong khyer ba lta na sdug dang/ lha rnams kyi 'dun sa na chos bzangs kyis 'dazhal las khong rnams yin te/ de kho na bzhin du pad+ma kusha ya dang ldan pa'i li'i
nga bya kha/ gzhal yas khang stong phragabargyad cu rtsa bzhi yin no// nags dang/ nye ba'i nagasadrang/ rdzing bu dang/ ljon shingadang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams

kan sdur gyi bzhin no// bad+ma ku shesha dang ldan pa'i ri'i nyo 'khor na skyes bu gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams ni rnam par bkra ba zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// de dga rnams ni rtagatu rgod pa dang
'gying bdang/ rtsa ba dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ bras dang/ skom dang/ 'khrig ba la dga' b rnams yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod papa las kyi chos kyis rnam par
sman pa rnams la rjes su lta ba'i byed de/ ban tshunarnam par 'phrul ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal soms tun 'di dag rnams kyis ci'i phyir ma mthong na/ sams can rnams 'di dag rnams
thams cad kyi sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ongab rnams thams cad kyang tha dad du 'gyur ba dang/ mdapar 'gyur ba dang/ rnam par 'gyas pa dang/ rnam par 'bral ba dang/ gzhan du 'gyur ba yin no//
tshe sams can 'di dag rnams thams cad ni 'thun pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang lang thadad dang med pa dang/ rnam par 'thor ba dang/ gzhan du 'gyur ba rnams 'byung bar gyur ro//
las kyis ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ dge ba'i las rnams kyis na lha dang mi'i nang du'o// ma dag ba'i las rnams kyis dmyal ba dang/ mi degs dang/ dud 'gro rnams su'o// de
la rnam par bkrab 'i gzugs dang ldan pa de dag rnamasabagamed par gnas pa yin pas 'dod pa'i sgradang/ reg bya dang/ ro dang/ gzugs dang/ dri rnams kyis kyang khas pa med pa dang
srod pas rnam par chags pa dang/ srid pa'i dbang du gyur pa dang/ srid pa'i chu bos khyer bar gyur pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi mas srogaparapyad pa/ gtilugagasaun par nub bar byang ba'i
phyiren zad pa dang 'grib pa'i bdag nyid rnams mi shes so// lang tshol ba ba rnams gog bor byed pa'i phyir na rgas bzhapenatu 'jigs pa yin no// rang gi skya bo dang/ grogs po dang//
gan 'bro la rnams thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'i phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs par gyur pa/ gson pa'i ljon shing srog bar 'gyur zhing/ sams can rnams thams cad kyis nags lhagam ma lug
pa' srog par 'gyur bas 'chi ba'i las khar 'ong ba'a'agyur ro// de dag ni mthong ba yang ma yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhi gnas te/ ri
bcus longs su bskor bar gyur pa'i byang phyogs sgra mi snyan 'ad lta sta/ sAng kAsha dang/ rAmanyam ba dang/ ri dgas kyis sgra dul ba dang/ sbyin dkar bo 'dzin pa dang/ mtho ba'abartsa gas
ba dang/ nye 'khor 'brang ba dang ldan pa dang/ dus na dga' ba dang/ kun dga' 'dzan pa dang/ yid kyis rjes su 'thun pa dang/ bad+ma ku sheshas dang ldan pa 'di dag rnams la/ nges pa rasal
can 'di dag rnams las gang gis skyes pa yin khaM na da gos kha yag khyung ga re shes rab kyas sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong par gyur pa sngar bzhin du sags can de dag rnams
[r?]ni deg pa'i las rnams la kun tu byung ba yin no// dge ba'i las rnams kyis mtha' la spyod par gyur pa yang srog gcod ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa la log par g.yog la
rnams lag tu spyongs pa'i gyur cing/ chongadung/ bcos pa'i chang dang/ skyos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas rnams kyang rab tu sangs pa dang/ 'dir dag ba rnam pa bcu'i las kyi
tshig mjug la spyod pa yin no// de dag rnams nadeg bde'i las rnams kyi rkyen gyis skyes pa yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'a byor spyod pa las dang ! chos dang/ rnam par smin pa rnams la rjes
su lta bar byedad/ las gang dag las skyes bu de dag rnams kyi dung dang skyes bu gzhashadag rnams kyi drangan yang gakhrugs kyis chod dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dbyangs
sbyarnamasaches khyad par du 'phags pa 'i skyes bu gzhan yod dam zhen/ des thos pa las byung pa'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mige gas mthong bar gyur pa sams can de dga rnams ni yang
dag pa'i lta ba mngon du byas pa g.yo ba med pa dang/ gzhan la gnod par mi byed pa dang/ drang bo dang drang bo'i rang bzhin can dang/ des par gyur pa dang des pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ chos pa
[o/]dang chos kyi rjes su 'jug ba dang/ chos dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs par byed pa rnams ni rgyu de rkyen de las lus zhig par gyur nas/ bde 'gro ma tho ris kyi 'jig rten
khalha rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen risabazhidang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// de las shi 'phos par gyur nas kyang 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di las shi ltas par gyur
nas kyang der skyabar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa las kyi chos kyi rnam par smin pa rnams la lta bar byed de/ las gang gis sems can dro dug rnams ches khyad par du 'phags
pa yinan/ das thog pa las byungab shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mashong bar gyur pa da rnams ni thams cad kyis kyang sngon mi 'jigs pa'i sbyan ba rab tu byin par gyur pa yin te/
grong khyer gyilho phyogs kyi sgor khrid par gyur ba'i sems can shin tu skyag pa rnams la srog gi sbyin pa byin pa yinal/ rgyab tu lag pa dam po ra bcings shing dur khrod du kha phyogs pa'i gyur
nas gsod pa'i rta pa TA brdungs par gyur cing/ gsheduma'i mi gtum po phyi bzhin du rjes su 'byung bar gyur la srog gi sbyin pa byin pa yin no// rgyud dang rgyan de las kyang lus zhig
par gyur pa na bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten pa lha rnams kyi nang du skya par 'gyur te/ rgyal chen sa bzhidang/ sum cu rtso gsum dang/ 'thab pral ba rnams su'o// gzhan yang rnal
'byor spyod pa la phyi khagyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ sems can de dag rnams kyis legs par byas pa 'i las gang gis sems can de dag rnams
chos khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ mchog tu khyud pa 'dal ba pa dang/ gakhrul/sa pa pang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul chapa'i mchog tu gyur pa dang/ skya bo rnams thams cad kyis mchod par byed yin/
zhen/ des klos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sems can de dag rnams ni sngon theg pa chen po la dad pa'i nor dang ldan pa'i dang tshul can dang/
theg pa chen po sgrogs pa la dga' bar gyur pas yanano// gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos 'dul ba dag nyin bar byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i
(gtam rgyud rnams kyang 'dzin par byed do// rjod par byed do// dasangs rgyus kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig shos bar gyur pa'i rgyudadang rgyan du las kyang rgyal por 'gyur ba yin te/ gling
bzhi la longs spyod par byed pa'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyura'o// de las sha bar gyur nas lha rnams su skya bar 'gyur te/ gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga drug bdun bldabs shing gling bzhi la
longs spyod par yang 'gyur ro// de las shi 'i ngos nas kyang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ rgyal chen ras
[z]khazha'adrang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ mtsham drang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed do// lha'i rigs de dag rnams las sha ba phos ba'agyur nas 'a'i
skya ba yin te 'din yang byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyis sgra dang/ reg bya dang/ rodang/ gzugs dang/ dro rnams nyams su myong b.rabyas nas slar yang de dag tu skyo bar 'gyur ro// lus
yang de nas shi 'thos par gyur pa nazlog pa chen po nyan pa'i sa bon de nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur te/ du tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs pa chen po
rnams su skye bar 'gyur go/ gzhan yang theg pa chen po shes par gyur ba de nyid dang/ thos nas kyang rjes su spyod pa 'gyur ba des bsam gtan gnyis pa thob par 'gyur te/ 'od chung dang/
tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gas pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos pa'agyur ba yis bon danyid dang/ thos par gyur nas kyang rjes su spyod cing spyod pa la zhugs pas
nibasam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur te/ dge chung dang/ dge rgyas dang/ tshad med dag dang rnams su rgya bar gyur ro// gzhan yang thug pa chan bo thos par gyur pa'i sa na de/
nyidadang byas shing rjes su spyod la rnam grangs kun chub par byas shing yongs su dri ba byas pas kyang bsam gtan bzhib thob par 'gyur te/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams rgyas pa dang/
'bras bu chab rnams dang/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mas kun nas nyon mongs ba'i ljon shing gi gnas rnams srog par byed pa'i mi che ba dad/ mi
gdung pa dang/ gya nom snangadang/ shin tu mthong dang/ 'og min gyis rnams su'o// gzhan yang theg pa chen po thos par gyur pa'i sa bon de nyid dang/ thos bar gyur nas kyang rjesasu
spyad cing spyod ba la zhugs padang/ yongs su dri ba byas te/ sams can lta ba khog ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod pa thag pa chen po thos pa'i sa bon de nyid kyis kyang srid pa'i btson rarnamA
thams cad zad pa'i rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'ag/ gzhan yang gal te bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems su yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// yang na gal te sams
can rnams thams cad kyi bdeb 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bla na med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i salas yongasasu goms pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur 'o// zog ba chen po shes pa'i sa bon de nyid kyis/
de'i tshe byang chubs mas dpa' chen po sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha/
dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir thog kha chen po thos pa'is bon gyis rtsa ba yang sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pa rnams yin no//

[4 ]de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thos pas kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ rang byang chub tu yongs su sngopar byed dam/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed na yang nyan thos kyi byad
chub tu yang gyur ro// dge slong ngan/ khyim pa rnams sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thos par gyur nas sbyin pa gtong bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi 'o brasabu thos par gyur nas tshul khrims spyod par
byed do// ye shes kyi 'bras bu thos par gyur nas yu shes goms par byed do// de'i phyir namatho ris dang thar pa gnyis ka'i sabon yang theg pa chen po thos pa yon no// de'i phyir 'di ni sbyin
pa rnams thams cad kyi yang mchog yin te/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ zang zing dang/ tshul khrims kyi sbyin pa rnams la ni 'di lta sta/ theg pa chen po sgrog pa'i spyan pa'o// tshul khrims
rnams kyi yang 'di lta ste/ shug ba chen po nyan pa'i tshul khrims so// thog pa chen po ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams thams cad dang/ debazhani ganganags pa rnams kyis yang
skyod bar byed pa po yin no// de'i phyi'i na thag pa chen po rtag tu mnyan par bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi
sAn gyi gling na ming ci'i ba tags pa'i yulaljongs gzhan yang gnas pa yin zhen/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur kha dpag tshad nyis stong ba/
@// nyal khor rnams kyis mig 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba sta/ de la yul ljongs 'di dog rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/ rnam mkha' ring ba zhes bya bdapag tshad sum
ka khargya pa yod do// de'i nye 'khor rnams na skyes bu gang dag rab tu gnas par gyur pa de dag rnams ni gob kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no// ljon shing dang/ khrus kyi rdzingabu dang/ ma tog dang/
'bras bu dang/ nyopa'i nags dang/ shing gol ba dang/ 'khri shing dang/ chu klung rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa ni la yang snga ma bzhin no// nam ma ba'i rong ba las 'das par gyur nas
gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba'i chu bo dpag tshad bdun brgya par 'gyur ba yod da/ chu klung dang/ ljon shing drang/ lugs dang/ nye ba'i nags dang/ rdzingadu phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni sngar gyi
bzhin no// gzhaladu med pa'i chu bo'i nye 'khor na yul ljongs lnga gnas so// 'di lta ste/ dbu rgyan 'dzin pa dang/ pa la sha yis kun tu khyab pa dang/ 'phreng ba gnas pa drang/ rma bya'i sgra
dang garana'i mtha' na gnas pa'o// dbu rgyan 'a na dpal ched spyad dang nyis brgya yan no// pa la shas kun tu khyab pa dang/ 'phrang ba gnas pa gnyis ni dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya yin no//
rma bya'i sgra ni dpag tshad brgya yin no// ka ra na'i mtha'an gnas pa ni dpag tshad yin no// gnyis pa yang de la dpag tshad brgyaphrag bcur gas te/ dpag tshad brgya pa dang/ dpag tshad brgya pa
[e] ]min no: 'di lta ste/ kun tuM lag tin gnas pa dang/ dri rgyu ba dang/ nag po gsus pa dang/ mig la kun tu rgyu ba dang/ ri'i klung na kun tu spyod pa dang/ gru gsum bdang/ kun nas
zlum par skyes pa dang/ gsus pa nyid dang/ g.yogs pa dang tshogs pa'o// gzhan yang yul ljongs de dag rnams nyid la lta bar byedado// chu klung dang/ shing ljon shing dang/ rdzing bu dang/
rkaba'i nags rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no// gling 'di ni gru bzhi pa yin te/ skyes bu rnams kyi bzhin yang de dang 'dra ba yin no// dpar na gru gsum du gyur pa ni 'dzam bu
glingango 'dzam bu gling gi skyes bu rnams kyi bzhin yang de 'dra ba yin no// de bzhin du byang phyogs sgram snyan pa rnams yin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes
su ltazhing gnas te/ des brag dang/ nags dang/ rdzing bu dang/ ma tog gi nye bar len pazlo ba'i me tog rnams dang/ 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams la bltas par gyur pas kyang

yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rol la kun tu lta bar byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa dang/ ba lang spyod
pa gnyis kyi bar na gzhan rgya mtsho'i rigs su gyur ba 'am/ ri'i rigs su gyur ba yod dam zhe na/ das thos ba las byung ba'i shes rab kyis san/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa byang
ga phyogs sgra mi snyan dang/ ba lang spyod pa dag gi byang phyogs na nye 'khor gyis mig ces bya ba rgya ma tshod pag tshad stong phrag bcu pa yod do// nya 'khor du dpag tshad gcig/
dang gzhan dang gatshod gnyis pa// gzhan langs 'og gis ku mar byed pa'i dbang gis chu'i mig yodrado// nye 'khorakyi mig gis rgya mtsho de las 'das par gyur nas rtsed mo'i 'phrang ba zhes

zla bya ba'i gzhan dang ga tshad stong phrag bcu ba yod de/ klu rnams kyis dbugs kyis sngags pas rtsa go mig rtse ltar nag pa yin no// rtsodamo'i 'phreng ba'i ri de las 'das par gyur nas dung gi sgra sa

ba mi sa ma zhes bya ba'i rgya mtshod bag tsha stong phrag bcu brams cad kyang gang bar tadang/ nya chen po dang/ rus sbal dang/ chu srin na kradang/ chu srinam ka ra dang ) nya phyis dang rnams kyis kun tu
gang bar gyur pa sam chog tu bgrod dka' ba blta bar 'jigs pa gang la longs spyod dang ldan pa'i klu nges par gnas pa yin te/ khro bas gzir ba khro' 'byin par byed do// dung gi sgra si mi simi'i rgyu
mtshod las ring du 'das nas chus khyab ba zhes bya ba'i rgya mtshodapag stong phrag bcu pa yod de/ gang gis rnams rlung gis dpag tshad bcu 'am/ dpag tshad nyi shu'am/ dpag tshad sum cu
mang lhag par byed do// chus khyab par byed pa'i rgya mtshod las ring du 'das nas mu tig gi shuka ta zhes bya ba'i gling mu tig gis kun tu gang bar gyur pa yod de/ klu dang nya rnams shi ba ragyur ba
de la rlung gis chu gyen du btab pas mu tig 'dren no// den dpag tshad stong pa yin no// mu tig gis shu ka ti'i gling dri las 'dus par gyur nas rin po che'i grogapo zhes bya ba'i ri dpag
tshad stong phrag lnga pa yin te/ rin po che bdun gyis rtse mo dang ldan zhing pe ma la hor bu mang bar gyur pa ri rab lhun po gnyis pa ji lta ba yin no// rin po che'i grog po 'o 'o de las 'das bar
gyur nas dpag tshad nyis stongadud la me tog gi nags dang/ rnam ba sna tshogs par dga' bar gyur pa rnams yodado// de las 'das par gyur nas legs par thog bzhes bya ba'i ri dag
tshad lnga stong ngo// de la gsar gyi pad+ma'i rdzing bun tsakra bA sgra snyan par 'byin par byed do// king shu ka'i nags tshal de las 'das par rgyu ranus ri dang/ chu klung dang/ ljon shang dang
rgya mtshod bag tshad stong phrag bcu'i gsar dang 'dra ba'i chus gang bar gyur pa yin te/ ri rab lhun po 'od kyi gser gyi mdog gi chu zhes bya ba yin no// 'phad du dpag tshad lnga brgya 'o// pa
lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling dpag tshad dgu stong pa yin te/ grong 'bum phrag bcu dang/ grong khyer stong gis gang bar gyur pa'o// grong gi mgo bor gyur pa ni bcu gnyis pa yin no// grong khyer gyi
gtso bor gyur ba dang lnga brgya yin no// de 'ar ji ltar 'dzam bu gling na kha rgyu li bu dras mgo drangs par gyur pa'i grong khyer gsum gyis lhag pa'i rgyu yin no// de bzhin dub lang spyodan la nga/
b+hA u Ta chen bos mgo drangs bar gyur pa'i grong khyer lnga brgya pa yin no// na b+ha ku Ta'i grong khyer yang dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa ste/ lam srangadang/ khang ba blangs kyis
ka/ bad kyi rim pa dang/ sgo mdo'i lugs dang/ rta babs kyis legs pa grang ba yin no// ba lang spyod kyi gling gi dbus kyi grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ rta babs brgya pa dang/ sa
gzhi bstar bas dga' ba dang/ dri ma med par gsal ba dang/ gang ka ra dang/ de lta bu'i la sogs pa'i grong rnams yin no// dbus kyi grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyang 'di ltarda/ bya ba la da
pa dang/ sams song bdang/ kun tu nyams pa'i stobs kyi na thar dang/ sa/ Ni ra'o// yul ljongs kyi gtso bo rnams la 'di lta sta/ 'dzam bu'i gling na ka ba dang/ kosha la dang/ ma

rgyu ga d+ha 'o// de bzhin du ji ltar nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling gi gtso bor gyur pa'i yul ljongs rnams 'di lta sta/ mi thi lo'i zhis bya ba'i yul ljongs dang/ tA Na Ti zhes bya ba'i yul ljongs dang
tsatu ro zhes bya ba'i yul ljongs dang/ kor na khro zhes bya ba'i yul ljongs dang/ sams kyis dri ma zhes bya ba'i yul ljongs dang/ ri rab tu rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i yul ljongs dang de dag rnams
ni ltar yul ljongs kyi gtso bor gyur pa rnams yin no// ba lang spyod kyi yul ljongs rnams thams cad bsdus par gyur na ni lul nyi shu rtsa lnga yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi yul ljongu
[/]bco brgyad bzhin no// ba lang spyod kyi gling na chu bo chen po lta yin no// 'di lta ste/ madras pa can dang/ tsun tsun pa ba tI dang/ zlaba'i shugs dang/ chu babad bo dang/ kun tu/
'dres pa'o// dper na 'dzam bu gling gi chu bo chen po bzhi bzhan te/ 'di lta ste/ gang gA dang/ ya mu nA dang/ bkru deng/ so ta'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi slong gi richen po lnga la
'di lta ste/ nATo Tizhi dang/ rwa gsum pa dang/ nor bu'i rta babs dang/ bar ba brgyu ba dang/ rtsub pa dang rnams so// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling na ri chen po rnams 'di lta ste/ gangs
can dang/ 'bigs byed dang/ ma la ya dang/ eka la sa ra dang sbrums bzhin te/ 'dilta'i ba lang spyod kyi gling gi mtsho chen bo ni gsum yin no// 'di lta ste/ gam bi radza lang dang/ bar
tshad dang/ gam bi 'od ka' rnams te/ ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi ma dros pa dang/ ma ban pa dang mtsho chen po gnyis bzhin// gzhan rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol kyi lus kyis lus
la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa'i mi rnams ci la nyo btsong du byed na/ des thos pa las byung ba shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa de
dag rnams b.long la to btsong dubyod pa dang/ gling 'di'i nye 'khor rnams ni ba lang gis yongs su gang ba yin to/ mi rnams thams cad kyang nu ma gsum pa yin no// ji ltar 'dzam
[©]// bu'i gling gi bud med rnams zla ba bcun bu rgyu ba de bzhin du/ ba lang spyod kyi glangan yang ro ma rab tu 'bab pa yazhe la/ chu klung dang/ nags dang/ nyiba'i skabs dang
khrus kyi rdzing bu dang/ ma tog gso kun tu khur ba dang/ 'bras bu rnams ni ba dzam bu gling na ji shug pa de nub 'on pa no// 'on kyang 'di dag gi 'bras bu rnams ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rigs/
phyid yin no// ma tog gi dri mas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi khyad do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis
ba lang spyod kyi gling gis de dag rnams skyes pa yin zhing dman ba dang/ bar ma dang/ chos dman pa'i cha yin zhe na/ des shos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis
mthong bar gyur pa skya bgazhan dag tu tshul khrims zhan par 'gyur bde sbyin pa zhan pa dang/ las dang/ chosazhan pa rnams kun tu spyad par gyur pa rnams yin no// ji ltar tshul khrims
zhan pa yin zhen/ 'dir skyes bu de dag rnams ni skye ba gzhan dudabul bor gyur pas de dag rin thang byas pas bstan gnas pa la nye bar gnas pa dang/ sangs rgyas drang/ chos dang/
dge 'dun la yang rgyal po'i chad pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal bar byed kyis/ rab tu dang bar gyur pas ni ma yin no// sbyin pa yang na gtang ngo// rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring byed pa'i phyir sazhu
[:/ ]bsgom pa yang ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi bka' ya ngam yin no// rgyal po'i zhabs tog byed pa'i don gyis sam// 'dod chab 'am/ 'og bar lta ba can dang/ zhing ngan ba can 'byin pa
'am dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rog bamed pa dang/ dus su ring du ma spyad pa de dag rnams 'dzam bu'i klong nas 'chi'ar sa par gyur nas/ las kyi rgyan gyis 'di'e skyes
pa yin te/ ro phyed du gyur pa'i bras dang ldan zhing/ dge ba dang/ mi dag ba'i las kyi 'bras bu rnams mngon par regs pa dang/ blo dman par gyur pa dang/ rnam par shes
ba ma chung ba dang/ budamed la brkam zhing chags pa yin te/ sngon gyi las de dag rnams kyi sangon gyi rgyan gyis yin no// sems can 'di dag rnams ni 'ong gi las nyid kyis 'gro ba yin
zhing las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa dang/ las brtan par byas pa dang/ las kyi sku gnas pa rnams yin no// ji lta'i las byed par 'gyur bdag pa 'cha/ sdig nga yang rung ste/ de dang
de dag nyid kyis las rtags kyi skal ba can du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mdegaba'i las kyis mthu'i las rnams la spyod par gyur na ni/ dmyal ba dang/ yi dwags dang/ dud 'gro rnams /
su skyo bar 'gyur ro// sa bon dang 'dra ba'i las rnams dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu rnams yin te/ da pa' na ko du ba'i sa bon las ni ko dra ba'i 'bras bu skya'i/ le rgod kyi 'bras bu ni ma yi
no nas kyi sa bon rnams las ni nas kyi 'bras bu'o// de bzhin du lon tan dman ba dang zhing dman ba rnams las kyang 'bras bu dman pa rnams skya'o// de dag
du sa bon bzang bo rnams lasani 'bras khu bakhrang po rnams sku'o// dpa ra na 'bras shal dmar po rnams las ni 'bras bu sha la doma' bo rnams so// yon sran snga'u rnams las ni lo na san/
zla snga'u rnams so// bur shing rnams las zhibur shing rnams so// zhing dang yon tan gyi khyad par rnams las ni 'bras bu bzang po rnams khyad par du 'byung ngo// 'di ltaste/ yon tan yod pa dang

sdug bsngal yod pa dang/ gnyis ka yod pa rnams so// de la yon tan 'od pa nyid ni bar ma yin no// 'on tan dang sdug bsnga la po u0f7cda pa ni khyad par can no// sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig yod pa ni chung du
rgyayin tesams kyis yon tan rnams ma gtogs pa yin no// 'di ltar phyi rol gyi rnams la yang zhing rnam pa gsum ste/ chub 'agyis ma bcom pa ni ba ra ma yin go/ rtswa dang chu ba la rab tu phal
bar gyur pa dang/ chu dang chom rkun pa'i 'jigs ba dang rnam pa ra la ba ni khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// rtswa ldum dang/ chub l gyis nyams par byas pa dang/ chu'i skyon dang/ 'jig
pa dang/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang ldan bar brjod pa rnams ni chung du yin te/ zhing las pa rnams kyis yongs su sbyang bar byas pa'i las rnams ni ma gtogs so// de la nad gi/
bdag nyid dang phyi rol gyi dngos po de dag rnams kyang las kyi bgo skal la sdod pa dang/ las brtan par byas pa dang/ las kyi skyo gnas pa yin te/ gzhan gyi stobs dang bcas pa yin

zhing phan tshun gyi rkyen can du gyur pa dang/ phan tshun skad bar byed pa yin no// de la nub kyi ba lang spyod pa'i skyes bu de dag rnams ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnams la spyod pa
yin te/ rtog pa dang bcas ba'i las rnams kyis 'di'i skyes pa yin no// gzhan yang shi 'phos pa'i gyur nas rang gi las kyi rlung gis 'khor bar do dras su 'khor bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor
spyod pa pa des phyi rol gyi las dang chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dumangon par rtogs nas/ gzhan yang phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta yang gnas de/ nub kyi ba lang
stod kyi gling las bdas ba gyur nas mi'i rigs sag/ chu bo'i rigs sag/ rgya mtsho'i rigs su gyur pa gzhan ni yod/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sag/ lha'i le gis

mthong bar gyur pa nub kyi ba lang spyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags po bganyis kyi gling dag gi bar na yod de/ nub kyi ba lang sdod kyi gling las ni 'das par gyur nas skyo ma pa zhes bya ba Di rgya mtsho/
na dpag tshad stong bcu gnyis pa'o// skyo ma dang 'dra ba'i chu gang yin pas gang bar gyurapa ste/ dung dang/ nya dang/ nya chen po dang/ chu srin na kra dang/ chu srin ma ka ra dang/ rus spal
dang tshusun byis pa gsod kyis yang phung por gyur pa yin no// skyo ma'i chu'i rgya mtsho de las 'das par gyur nas ba drungs 'dra ba'i nye 'khor du dpag tshad lnga brgya
pa yod do// de la dug chen po'i sprul rnams rab tu gnas so// de las 'das par gyur nas chu dron mo zhes bya ba'i rgya mtsho yod de/ sprul de dag rnams kyi kha rlangs dron mo'i dugagis dron mor
'gyur ro// de la ni sems can gyi rigs cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te/ sbrul dug can dedag gis dbugs 'byung bas dus byed par 'gyur ro// dug gi rang bzhin yin pas chu gang dron

ba: mo'i 'gyur go/ de las 'das par gyur nas chud ma ra po zhes bya ba'i rgyam tshod pag tshad lnga stong yod do// de la klu dang sa 'ogan gnas bar gyur pa 'i lha ma yin rnams phan tshun du zhe sdang bar gyur tA
khril gyis khu ban nas sbas bros par gyur ba dang 'khrug par byed do// kyang na gnas pa'i klo stobs canang dag gis kyang lha ma yin de dag rnams kyi stobs mi 'phrogs so// da las 'das par gyur nas

srin mo'i gling dpag tshad nyis stong pa yod do// ral ba can zhes bya ba'i srinemo dad la rab tu gnas ba yin no// dri dngacha tog gi 'phrang pa khar 'jug cing dra ba'i bras dang ldan pa mig btsum num gyi
bar la dpag tshad stong du phyin pa ra mgyogs pa mi rnams la lta bar byed pa dang/ yid kyang rtag tu de la song bar gyur pa yin te/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa rnams kyi nagling 'di na du mi

tsa/ zhim pa yin no// ral ba can gyi gling de las 'das par gyu rams ngag bra'i gling da pa gatshad lta stod pa yod do// de la sgras khyab pa zhes byaba'i sha lnga rab tu gnas ba yin no// de las 'das pa'agyur nas gling
gis legs par gangang zhes bya ba'i dpag tshad lnga stong ba yin no// legs par gang ba'i ri la ljon shing rnams kyis legs par gang ba la 'di lta sta/ shing nA la kor dang/ pan sa dang/ mo tsa
dang hin ta la dang/ ta A la dang/ rag ta dang/ sa' po dang/ sang ldeng dang/ ti la ka dang/ Ardzu na dang/ ka dam pa dang/ nI ba dang/ ni tsul dang/ rtsom pa dang/
khardzu ra dang a glu dang/ pi tsu ma rdadang/ pa der dang/ pa Ta dang/ king shu ka dang/ klu'i ma tog dang/ ka ma dang/ mya ngan med dang/ pi lin d+ha dang/ ka d+ha ka dang/ ka ta ka
dang/ ka'ani kArangashin tu lhug pa dang/ mAli kAgasar ba dang/ pA tA la dang/ kAba'i tha dang/ dpalashing dang/ lhangashing dang/ shug pa dang/ kar wIr dang/ mya ngan na da sngon po
dang/ ku ra ba ka dang/ kun da rnams te/ phung bor skyod pa'i ljon shing rnams gyis legs par gang ba dang/ 'bab chub rgya phrag gis dga' bar gyur ba yin no// nags kyi khams rnams

dang ldan pa'i nang de la ni dri'i rnams rtse dga' bar byed do// legs par gang ba'i 'i de las 'a das par gyurags rgya mtsho dpag tshad lnga stong du 'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin no// de la ni chu bo ma dang 'dra ba
yod de ro'om dang mnyam pa yin no// bdag nyid kyis dngos po dpag tshad lnga par gyur pa'i cha 'ga' zhig sgrubar byed pa yin no// 'o ma'i chu'i rgya ma tshod las 'das par
gyur nas byama'i gnas skabs zhes bya ba'i dpag tshad stong du ldog shing gi ngam grog tu gyur pa yin no// de las 'das pa gyur nas klu'i dug bcom zhes bya ba'i rgya mtshodapag tshad drug par

rgyu gyur pa gang la stobs bya ba'i ku rob tu gnas pa yin no// phan tshun du mi mthun par gyur pa rtagatu ma zhi ba la dga' ba yin no// phan tshun gyi klu'i dug bcom zhes bya ba'i rgya mtsho de las ring

du 'dus nas dumanyam pa 'gyur nga zhes bya ba'i rgya mtsho yod de/ dpag tshad nyis stong du tshubaNan zhing gnas pa dang/ chu 'bacu dang bu zab mo yin te/ nya dang/ chu srin ma ka ra dang/ dung dang 3 chu

rgyu srin byis pa gsod rnams kyis kun tu gang bar gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang las kyi chos kyis rnam par smin pa rnams shes pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa des lta bar byed de/ ji skad du bshad pa'i rgya mtsho
dang/ chu bo dang/ gling dang/ nags dang/ ri dang/ ljon shing rnamasadang/ gnas de dag rnams gang la yang bdag cag ma skyes pa dang/ ma shi ba dang/ 'chi'aphos pa'i ma gyur pa dang//
rgyas par ma gyur pa dang/ 'thun pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba rnams thams cad dang yang tha dad du gyur pa dang/ med par gyur pa dang/ bye bar gyur pa dang/ bu la bar gyur pa dang/ gzhan du gyur/
[/ ]dang/ ldan par ma gyur pa dang/ gang yang las kyi bgo skal las spyod pa// las kyi sku gnas pa las brtan pa'abyas pa/ rang gis las kyi 'bras bu myong bar gyur bas 'chi'i lo bdang
skya bar ma gyur pa de'i rgya mtsho'i yulaphyogs sam/ mi'i yul phyogs ljon shing gi phyogs rnams la yang gcig kyang ma mthong ngo// lan brgya phrag dang/ denas stong phrag/dang/ lan stong
phrag brgyadang/ lan bye ba 'bumadu gang gang la bdag cag rnams skyes pa dang/ shi ba dang/ rgyas bar gyur pa ma yin pa ni khab kyis phug pa tsam yang med do/ 'thun pa dang yid du/
'ong bar gyur pa rnams thams cad kyang tha dadadugyur pa dang/ bod pa'agyur ba dang/ rgyas par gyur pa dang/ rnam par bral bar gyur par gzhan du gyur ba nAlanab phrug dang/lanastong phrag dag
lan brgya stong phrag dang/ bye bar gyur pa dang// brgya stong phrag tu 'gyur zhing/ 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bdod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi zhags pas kun nas bcing
nas 'khor ba yang dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i 'ganas rnams su skyo ba dang/ 'chib dang/ rgya bar 'gyur ba yin no// de'i phyir na myur ba myur bar 'khor ba las
yid 'byung bar gyis shig/ 'khor ba la brkam par 'gyur zhing chags par 'gyur bar ma byed dang/ 'khor ba 'di ni sdug bsngal ba yin no// tshabar gyur pa'i tshor ba dang ldan zhing/
0 @#// rtsub par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba dang ldan pa min// sdug bsngal dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i tshor ba yin no// rgapa dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/
sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bdebamangab yin no// ltung ba'im grwa'i dang bod par 'gyur ba'i sgo yin no// 'din ni shin tu phra ba'agyur pa'i rtag kha dang/ bde ba yang yod pame rinano// dbar na nyi

ma la mun pa shin tu phra bayang mad do// deltar rnal 'byor spyod ba de phyi rol gyi lus la lus kyis rjes su lta zhing gnas so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du phyi rol gyi lus rnam

[% ]rig par byed da/ chumanyam pa'i rgya mtshod las ring du 'das nas chu klung gi rigs su gyur pa 'am/ rgyamatsho'i rigs su gyur pa 'am/ ri'i rigs su gyur pa gzhan yod dam zhe na/ des thos pa las byung ba'i

shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba shar gyi lus la pags po zhes bya ba'i gling yod do// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyud pa la 'khor yongs su blug par gyur pa grong dang/ grong khyer dngo/ tshong
dus rnams phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chu klung dang/ ljon shing dang/ nags dang/ nye ba'i zhags dang/ khrus kyi rdzing bu drang/ gling dang/ ri dang/ 'bab chu dang/ shing tshang tshing rnams dkrig dang
ldan pa'i nags dang bcas pa dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras budang/ ri dgas dang/ bya rnams kyang phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de la ri du ga bo 'di dag rnams ni thams cad la chab r gyur pa yin te/
[d ]'di lta ste/ logs chen po dang/ nags kyi'i brang ba dang/ rma bya'i tshogs dang/ ri dwags kyi khrod dang/ rgya mtsho'i khyon du 'gro ba dang/ mig che ba byung ba rnams so// ridi dug rnams
kyis shar phyogs lus 'bags bo'i gling yongs su bskor ba yin te/ 'dzam bu gling ri bzhis ji lta bar te sngar bzhinano// de la legs chen po'i ri rgyur ni dpag tshad sum stong yin te/ ra de la
dpag tshad stong stong gis nags gsum yod do// 'di lta ste/ su pe lang gi shugs dang/ 'bab chu'i sgyu dang ldan bzhugs dang/ ma li ka ga hAri'i nags so// nagasan ljon shing rnams
phun sum tshogs par gyur ba la 'di lta ste/ li li ka'i ljon shing dang/ ri'i khrodanas smyos pa'i ljon shing dang/ yal ga matam pa'i ljog shing dang/ bzod dka' bar gyur nas skyes bar gyur
pa'i ljon shing dang klu zhi rgyas pa'i ljon shing dang/ ud la skyes ba'i ljon shing dang/ ri brag na skyes pa'i ljon shing dang/ 'dzam bu gling rnams kyis ljon shing dang rnams ni sngar bzhin no//
ri chen bo de 'khor na skyes bu gang dag gnas pa dedag rnams ni mo'i gtsug canazhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// chu klung yang 'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta sta/ phyir 'grim pa dang/ su chu
TA dang chu g.yo ba dang/ klu'i chu dang/ nags nas byung ba dang/ tsar tsadang rnams so// nags kyi 'o phrang pa'i 'di'i tshad nadab chag chod stong yin no// de la nags 'di dag rnams yod do//
'di lta ste/ kug kuT phyir dang/ lha shing gi nags dang/ rtsi ri ka'i nags dang/ dub pa dang/ shin tul skyes ba dang rnams yin no// chu klung yang 'di dag/
[?] rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/ 'khri shing gis g.yog pa dang/ rtse mo la 'khor ba dang/ chunag po dang/ logi na tu 'phyang bdang/ dub dga' ba dang rnams so// ri'i nags kyi 'phreng/

ba'i nye 'khor na skyes bu gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams ni mya gyur can zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyura'o// ri gsum pa rma bya tshogs la rnal 'byor spyod pa ba des ma thong bar gyur pa dpag tshad stong yin no//
de la nags 'di dag yod do// 'di lta ste/ sprin gyi nags dang/ rtag tu glog 'khyug pa dang/ sgra 'phangs mthon po dang/ lhag pa thung ba dang man Ta lang dang rnams so// chu klung yang 'di
dag rnams yod do/ 'di lta ste/ ni tsu lund 'babadang/ drang srong dga' ba dang/ sngon 'bab dang/ btsang po rnams yin no// rma bya'i tshogs kyis nags kyi che ba kho'i skyes bu gang dag
rgya'i gnas pa de dag rnams la ni mgul pa sngon po zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ shar phyogs kyi lus
ba bags po'i gling na ri'i rigs sam/ chu klung gi rigs gzhan dag lo dadam zhe na/ des shos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ri gzhan bzhi pa'i dgas kyi

wa/ khrod ces bya ba yod do// ridi la nags 'di dag rnams yod do// 'di lta ste/ ral ba can gyi nags dang/ kun dag 'a ba'i nags dang/ rta'i sprin gyi nags dang rnams so// ljon shing dang/ ma tog dang/ 'phrag bu phun sum

tshogs pa rnams ni sngar gyi bzhin no// de la chu klung 'di dag rnams yodado// 'di lta ste/ shin tu grol bar gyur ba'i chu dang/ chu 'khor na dga' ba dang/ tshogs ba rnams yin no// 'degs kyi rigs kyang 'di dag rnams yin no//

'di lta ste/ de re nas dang/ te'ago gyi khri ba mkhadaga' ba dang/ bltas pas 'bros pa dang/ urang gAts+tshadang/ lam bzang bo dang/ phrag dog klu skyes dang/ ba lang gi rna ba dang/ glang po cha 'thun ba dang/ byis pa mchog dang/ grib

ma la dga' ba dang/ ribong lug dang/ rnga mo'i lus dang/ mjug ma zug po dang/ mgo dkar po dang/ rmadang bcas pa dang/ sbrul lce dang/ rang gi so brgyad dang/ sdod pa dang/ sgrubs kyis madren ba lta// ri dgas kyi tshogs de da la/

rnams kha li ni 'dzam bu glingan gang yod pa ma yin go/ 'i khrod kyi'i la zhags dang/ nye ba'i zhags dang/ rdzi debudang/ ljon shing dang/ byu dang/ ma togar/ na sum tshogs bsnems ni sngon gyi bzhin te/ri dgas kyi khrod kyi ri la

'dzam bu'agling gis togarnamasani thams cad kyang yod do// ri dgas kyang khrod kyis nye 'khor na gang dag gnas pa'i skyes bu de dag rnams gzhi shugs sdom pa zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// shar gyi lus 'phags kyiglingaga'i ldab de'i nag

dnganyapa'i nag dang/ rdzobu rnams la ltab byed do// rgyamatsho rgyan du 'grob zhes bya ba'ir depag tshad stong dang ldan pa nags dang/ nyoba'i zhags dang/ rdzingasu rnams kyis kun nas long ba'i sdon gyi bzhin no// de la yang nags 'di ga rnams yod

do// 'di lta ste/ thig le gsum pa zhes bya ba'i nags dang/ mgrin pa 'gag pa dang/ dga' ba'i li'i nags dang rnams so// chu klung yang 'di dag yod do// 'di lta ste/ ra gsum pa dang/ bu co padang/ rdob 'grig/

[P]/ba dang rnams so// rgya mtsho rgyan du bgroba'i ri'i nye la kho na skyes bu gangadog gnas pa de dag rnams la ni sgrin po zhes bya ba'i ming du 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho gyin du 'gro ba'i ri la bltas bar gyur bas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi zol lta bar

blo byed do/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gas te/ shar gyi lus la pags po'i gling na ri'i rigs su rgyu ra pa gzhan dag yod dam zhen/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig

gas mthong bar gyur pa mig ga 'phrang ba'i ri dpag tshad stong dang ldan pa yod de/ nya'akhor na lugs dang/ rtoba'i nags dang/ rdzing bu dang/ 'bab chu phun sum tshogs pa'agyur pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ri de gas dang/ byadang/ me tog dang/ 'bras

bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams chu sngar gyi bzhin no// migagi 'phrang ba'i ri bgami ma thong pa'i klung zhes bya ba'i chu klung 'bab pa yin te/ dbag tshad du brab pa yin no// mig gi 'phreng ba'i nye 'khor na skyes bu gang dag gnas pa de dag rnams la ni

ta'akhor gyis mi ga ces bya ba'i zhing du 'gyur ro// de ltar shar gyi phyogs lus 'phags po'i gling ni'i dug gis yongs su bskor ba yin no// de'i nanganagrong khyer chen po gsum la 'di lta ste/ dga' bab zang po zhes bya ba dang/ nags mngon par

dag 'a ba zhes bya ba dang/ nye 'khor na rtsa dga' ba zhes bya ba'o// grong khyer gyi churan dbag tshad gsum yin no// lhag mar gyur pa bar ma dang tha chung gi grong khyer rnams kyi drug cu rtsa gsug yin no// bar ma'i grong khyer la phung po grong khyer

zhes bya ba dang// nya'akhor gyi sgra zhes bya ba dang ngo// grong khyer chung ngu la thams cad 'gro bshus bya ba'i grong khyer dang/ 'brog tu rnam par chad pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po dang sdu/ de dag ni bar ma dang grwa chung gi grong khyer rnams kyi ni

lte ba gtso bor gyur pa rnams yin no/ grong khyer bye ba brag gsum dang/ grong stong phrag brgya ba lnga dang/ stong phrag gsum dang/ grong lnga brgya dang/ gagis lhag pa'i lnga bcu dang rnams shar gyi lus bas sogs gling na yod de/

de la 'di dag rnams ni grong gi gtso bo yin te/'di ltar nam mkha'i dri ma dang/ lbu ba'i tshogs dang/ bri kI rang dang/ skye bo thams cad pa dang/ lo 'dab mngab dang/ b+hedu ra dang/ smin pa'i rtsod dang/ mdor bsdus ba dang/

biTaM dang (gnod pa'i zhags dang/ phan par 'jug ba'i mig dang/ bA du 'u ti dang/ bre'u 'bru'i lus kyi shing dang/ dus kyi chu dang rnams te/ da lta bu la sogs ba'i grong rnams yin no// gling gi nyo 'khor yongs su zlum pa ji lta

kha mi kho nar mi nus kyis bzhin nye 'khor yang yongs su sbrum pa yin no// de la 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams na rna ba dang skra la rgyan 'dogs so// byang phyogs sgra mi snyan pa rnams ni mig dang dpung ba la rgyan 'dogs so// ba lang

spyod pa las ni gsus po dang mgrin pa la rgyan 'dogs so// shar phyogs lu sa 'phags po rnams zhi b.rudang phrag pa la rgyan 'dogs so// de la de dag rnams kyang skyes bu'i gnas bzhi po rnams kyis rang rang gi lus la yin no/

gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa las kyis chos kyi rnam pa 'a smin ba rnams la rjes su lta ste/ las gang gis nges par sams can de dag rnams 'dir skyes pa yin zhing khyad bar du 'phags pa dang/ bar mdang/ tha ma rnams kyang khyad par du
bab las bdang/ bar ma dang/ tha ma'i las rnams kyis byas pa yin na/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sngon sams can 'di dag rnams las dang/ chos

sha dang/ rnam par smin pa rnams mngon ba'am shes par gyur to// de mi shes par gyur pa'i phyir na/ zhing ngan pa la sbyin pa ngaskal ba sbyin ba yin te/ dper na phan 'dogs ba'i don las/ sems gzhan du gyur bas sam/ zhabs 'bring gi phyi'i

yang te sngar bzhinano// las des sems can tha ma rnams 'dir skyes par gyur te/ bar ma rnams kyang tshul khrims dman pa rnams yin no// 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring du srog gcod pa spong bar byed pa la sangs par gyur kyang rang

ts+tshA chu dang ba'i sems kyis ni ma yazhi'o// gang de dag rnams ni rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig ba'agyur nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lho rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba ni bar ma yin no// khyad par du 'phags pa rnamasazhi khyad par du 'phags

ba'i las rnams kun tu bgrod par 'gyur ba yin te/ thal ba chen bo zhan bar byed pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ rjes su yi rang bar byed pa dag gis yin no// theg pachen po nyan par byed pa dang/ ston par byed

pa dang : rjes su yi rang ba'abyed pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs bar byed pa ma gtogs pa'i 'khor ba'i dgon pa nas nges par 'byung bar byed pa gcig kyang ngas ma mthong ngo// sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di inano// 'di lta ste//

pas kha chen po sgrog par byed pa'i sprin go/ shes rab rnams kyi na chog kyang 'di yin te/'di ltar theg pa chen po nyan par spyod pa'i shes rab bo// thog pa chen po sgrog ba'i yon tan brjod pa rnams ni sngar gyi bzhin no// des shal

[4 ]gyi lus 'phags po'i gling gi sa las can rnams kyis las dang/ chos dang/ rnam par smin pa rnams mkhrong bar gyur nas yang dag pa ji lta babs du phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta ste/ shar gyi lus 'a bags po'i

gling gi bar rnams ni ri'i rigs sam/ chu klung gi rigs chu gzhan ci yod ce na/ des shos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa shar phyogs lus 'phags po'i gling dang ga tshad stong phrag

brgyad pa'i bar las rang du 'das nas lcags kyi phung bo zhes bya ba'i ri dpag tshad sum stong ba yod pa gang las shin tu phra bar gyur ba'i lcags kyi phyi ma rnams ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'thul ba yin no// lcags kyi

lung po'i ri de las 'das pa'agyur nas/ khor yug gi rnam pa lhe phyu pa'i rgya mtshodapag tshad bdun stong pa yod do// khor yug gis rnam par byas pa tid kyis ri ldas yongs su bskor ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ khab kyi kha dang/ lho

chen po dang/ thu rlu Ta nA dang/ sbrul dang/ bla lhas pa rnams so// khor yug gi rnam pa'i rgya mtsho de las 'das par gyur nas khamasa rnams dang ldan ba zhes bya ba'i gling dpag tshad sum stong pa yod do// de la rig pa 'dzin pa dang

gsang ba pa dang/ mi 'am ci rnams rab tu gnas so// gling 'di ni shin du dga' bar 'gyur ba yin no// chu klung dang/ rdzing bu dang/ ljon shing rnams kyang phun sum tshogs ba yin no// 'dzam bu gling dang/ shar gyi

lus 'phags po'i ridigs dang/ bya dang/ ljon shing rnams kyang ste/ gling de las ring du 'das par gyur nas/ rgyu skar mang po zhes bya ba'i ri'i rtse mor rab lhun po las byung nas ha cang mi ring ba na mo nga ngo/
de la gnas nas kyang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i las rnams kyi dbang gis yin te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi dge ba dang/ mi dag pa'i las kyi rlung gis de las 'char bar byed pas 'char/

ba yin no// de dag rnams 'dzam bu gling du mgrong bar gyur nas las dang 'bras bu'i de khon nyid mi shes pa'i bram khre rtog ge ba rnams kyis gabris byas so// skar mas byas so zhes rgyal po dang rgyal po'i blon po la yang kun

du rig par byed do// de la de dag rnams ni lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i bram ze rtog kha rnamA kyis mashong ba yin no// dge ba dang mi dag pa'i las rnams ji lta bar gal te gabras dag ba byas pa yin na/ rte/
ma dang zla ba 'di dag kyang gzab khyad par can yin na/ das byas pas kyang dge ba dang ma dag pa'i dus dag rab tu 'jug pa yin la/ de'i tshe dus thams cad kyis ma tog dang 'bras bu rnams yod par

'gyur ro: gang gi rim nang zla ba de dag gnyis gabra'agazhan gyis gzung bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ra dus nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag dang rgyu skar rnams thams cad kyang phan tshun du dang gtsas gnod pa ra byed pa yin

de'i phyir na dge ba dang me deg ba dag gza' dang rgyu skar gyis ma byas so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa gabrang dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa dang/ lta bas byas ba dang/ las kyi 'bras bu rnams kyi phyi rol gyi lus kyis

lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de la gabras byas ba dang rgyu skar mang po 'i rgya mtsho'i char ba dang/ ri rab lhun po dang/ char pa'i rtse mo rnams la kun tu bltas par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyi

rol la lta bar byed do// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa phyi rol gyi lus kyis lus la rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ rgyaskar mang po'i rgya mtshodapag tshad bdun stong pa de las 'das par gyur nas/ b+ha ra ta

lhag par gnas ba zhes bya ba'i gling yod do// brag dang/ chu klung dang/ ljon shing rnams phun sum tshogs pa yin no// 'dzam bu gling gi ljon shing dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad kyang sta/ dpag
tshad sum stong yin no// rig pa 'dzin pa dang/ gsang ba pa dang lhag par gnas pa yin te/ de na 'dod pa'i rang bzhin gyis ljon shing dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de

las ring du 'das nas mtshams kyi mtha'i ri zhes bya ba ste/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dang/ 'dzam bu gling pa rnams thams cad kyi yang mtshams su gyur pa yin no// rgyamatsho 'di yang chu bsil ba yin no/ shar
gyi lus 'phags po dang/ 'dzam bu gling dag gi ri'i dpag tshadasum stong du dung dang/ nya chen po dang/ chu srin na kra dang/ chu srin ma ka ra dang/ rus sbal dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ chu
srin kum b+hi ra dang/ 1 rnams rab tu gnas so// mtshams kyi ri de las 'das par gyur nas dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgya mtsho yod do// 'dzam bu'i gling gi ngos gzhan zhig na dpag tshad lnga stong du dma'
po'i mdog gis kun tu gang bar snang ba 'dzam bu'i gling 'as ha cang mi ring ban yod do// de la ya nga nyashin tu mang ba yin no// khrag rab tu phal che ba yin no// phan tshun du yang 'tsho bar gyur

ny+tsaspya// pazag gcod par byed do// bdag nyid kyang za bar byed do// khrag rab tu phal che ba de'i phyir na chu de yang dmar po yinan/ dmar po ra kun tu snang ba'i phyir yang rgya mtsho 'di la dmar po tha snyad du[:]

'byung ba yin// de las ring du 'dod nas stonapo zhes bya ba'i rgya mtshodapag tshad bdun stong dang ldan pa ste/ chu'i klung thams cad kyang nyasagang ba dang mchog tu zab pa yin no// de las 'das par gyur

[@]1 nus rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba rgya mtshodapag tshad sum stong pa yod// ri dang/ rin po che dang ldan pa gser gyi bye ma dang/ rdodang/ khabya ka dang/ chu sa ra ga wa'i sdodang/ mu tig gi phye ma dang/

rab dra ma'i ljon shing dang/ su ku sa raka mang ba dang/ rinapo chu du ma dang ldan pa yin no// de la mngar ba'i dug sems 'phan par byed pa zhes bya ba ljonoshangs skyes pa'i 'bras bu de dag bya 'am//

mi yang rung ste/ 'dzam bu gling bar gtogs pa rnams kyis gang gi tsho zos par gyur pa 'anyi ma bdun pa la 'chi bar byed do// bya gang dag gis za bar byed pa de dag rnams kyang dus byed de// na po ma'i/

gling de las 'das par gyur nas lan []zhes bya ba'i rgya mtshodapag tshad stong phrag bdun du tachen po dang/ shug to dang/ rus sbal dang/ na kra dang ! chu srin dang/ klu dang/ bya dang rnams kyis gang

bgyur pa/ srin po dang sha wa rnams kyis brel dog du gyur pa// chu'i nangan skyes pa'i ba drum dkar po dang chu'i nangan nub par gyur pa'i ra yaneno/ 'dzam bu gling ga 'khor du gyur pa'i gling lnga brgyas yos

[/]bskorab yin no// 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa'i gtsobor gyur pa rnams dper bya na 'ad lta ste/ gser gyi sa gzhi dang ldan ng dang/ rin po che'i rdob dang ldan pa dang/ ke tu dang/ ma le ka'i gling dang/ dung dang/
mu tig dang/ ma ka la 'byung ba dang/ gshol mda' ba dang/ dka' thub dang 'brel ba dang/ kun tubazang po'i nags rnams dang/ rma bya'i nags dang/ dra'i 'phrang ba dang dwagasum pa dang/ sdodapung
byazang bo dang snanA she dudang ) lang ka'i grong khyer na nges par gnas pa'i srin po dang/ ri bcu gnyis la nges par gnas pa dang/ lhun po 'a bo lAkadang/ ral nges par gnas pa dang/ dung dang/ mu
tig dmar po dang/ kha ba 'khor ba dang/ dngul dang bcas pa'i byams yongs su bskor ba dang/ lam med pa dang/ gser la sogs pa'i lcags ri las bskor ba dang/ shu ka ti'i gnas dang/

bumo'i shing gabaskor ba dang/ de dag rnamasan skyes bu rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ste/ji ltar khyad pa gyur pa'i gling de dag rnams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su bskor ba yin zhing/ da pag tshadaban

stong du dga' bar gyur pa dang/ ra masan sngaragyi bzhin no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa pa phyi rol gyi lus gyis lus la rjes su lta zhung gnas te/nyim dang zla ba 'di dag 'od kyi tshad ji tsam zhig yin zhag

des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam/ lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ra rab lhun po dang/ skyes bu'i gnas bzhi'i legasabazhi dang/ skyes bu'i gnas bzhi po dang/ de dag rnam gnyim dang zla ba 'di
dag gis ba tugasal bar byed do// rgya mtsho yang riti'i legs de nas dbag tshad stong phrag brgyadahurtsa bzhi yin pa las de'i phyed na rab tu gsal bar byed do// phyed ni mchog tu 'jigs

par gyur pa'i mun pas kun tukhyab par gyur to// pha rol nan khor yug tu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu gyur pa shan tu bzod par dka' ba'i las kyi mo'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin rab tu 'bar bar gyur la// 'khor

la khyudamo zhes bya ba'i ri yod pa gang la rgya mtsho'i churang bar gyur na ni 'o mar 'gyur ro// de ji srid du bar gyur pas na de dag nor 'gyur ro// zhe yang mar gsar nyid du 'gyur ro// ji srid du kun nas reg par

gyur nga khri mar 'di yang zhu ba'i mard 'gyur ro// mar zhu ba de dag dmyal ba'i mi de dag rnams kyis 'tshig par byed de// de bzhin du chug kyang sa gzhinub par byed do// de kho na bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams/

'ad/ nga yin te/ rnal 'byor spyi pa pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ga par 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor spyod pa pa des yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong la yongs su chub par byed pa'i blos kyang

@# gang zhig rtag pa 'am brtan pa'am/then thug du gyurang 'am/yongs su mi 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur pa 'am/gang la yang bdag cag rnams theg ma dang/ tha ma dang mthu med pa'i 'khor ba rnams su las kyi 'bras/

bu 'bago skal la spyod pa dang/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bus mnar ba dang/ lan brgya phrag dang/ de nas stong phrag rnams su yang 'chi 'phos pa dang/ skyes par ma gyur pa'i gnas gcig dang yang ldan pa ni deb gcig

kyang ma mthong// yang dag pa ji lta babazhin du rtag par rgyun du nang dang/ gzhanadang/ nang dang phyi'i lus rnams la yang lta bar byed pas na lugs la kun tu chags bar mi 'gyur ro// sdug pa gyur pa'i sgra dang/ dang/ gzug

dang dri dang/ reg bya rnams kyis kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar na ta'i grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang/ lus dran pa klobar gzhag pa la mngonapar brtson pa'i dge slonganams kyang bdud kyi

drungan rab tu ma gcad so// de ltar lug dranang bar gzhag pa thob par gyur pas kyang rab tumang po rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i mig sprin phuganas bla na med pa'i chos rnam la chos kyi lag rgyas par gyur to//

dge slong dag ngas ji skad du lus dran pa dbar gzhag pa bstan par bya'o zhes brjod pa la bshad ba ni dedag rnams yin no// dge slong dag de dag rnams dang/ ri khrod dang/ ri'i bug dang/ dur khrod dang/ bla ga bamed
ba dang rnams su rtswa sog g.yung po la bsam gtan du gyis shig/ bag med pa sa gnas pa ma byed cig/ las 'chiba'i dus 'gyod par 'gyur bar ma byed dang/ 'di khyed rnams la rjes su gdams pa yin
no/ bam ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa la/ dge slong de dag rnams kyang rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// lus dran pa nyabar gzhag pa'o// stong phrag
sum cu rtsa drug pa 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dranapa nye bar gzhug pa zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung// de rgyud bzhin gshegs pas
gsungs// de yi 'gog pa gang yin pa// dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs// nye bar mkho ba thams cad legs par skrun pa la sogs pas phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos po mtha' dag dang ldan

[v]kazhi'i yon tan dang rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag ga 'byung gnas su gyur nga/ sbyang zhing sbyin la skye bo thams cad blo dang ldan pas 'dzam bu'i gling yul rnams kyi mig tu dgongs nas// ston pa yang dag par rdzog/

pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdo gas pa' sad+ma rgyas pa ni klong chen po'i ba ba bachu bo gang+ga'i 'gramagyis bsdus paches yangs par gyur pa/rgyab gyi yul 'di yang da bug sugatogog pa las shar gyi sha chu yul chen ngo shaphyogs pa len

dra zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po ston pa'i bstan pa'i mig dang/ rtsa ba dang/ gzhir gyur pa dpal dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i sras phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal gyis gzhan lasamatho bsam gachen sbyar ba'i

sa'i bdag po ni ba'i rigs la zhes bya ba'i mtho ris dang/ thar pa'i them skas mkhas shing brtsun la dul ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas su mdzad pa'i gtsug lag khang rdzogadadA lanamakhag pa'i

sbyadagu pa da rnams mang du byung zhing/ mngags kyang chen po ka chen bo gyur pa lnga brgya pa'i thams cad makhyen pa'i 'dzig rten par sgrogs ba/ sngon gyi slob dpon chen po rnams dang sangs pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsngags

pas paN+Di ta rnams kyis bsngags par mdzad pa// 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pas nga rgyal pa'i rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lus kyi mgo ltar gnyan par khur ba// mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can pad+d+he ta'i 'jig

[.]rten pa rnams kyis gtsug gnor bu ltar 'a dzin pa// 'di ring du spungs pa'i skye bo thod pa bslab pa la brtson pa rnams kyis skyonaen legs par mthong bas lam 'dren pa'i mag dang 'dra bar lta ba/ yul gyi ma than nad
kyis bu gcig pa lta snying du sdug pa'i 'thun bar gyurang nyas/dmu rgod lta bar log par sgrub pa rnams las 'thun par 'dzin pas yade 'brog par mdzad pa ga 'gro ba nyam thug po rnams gzigs nas/ brtse

ba'i zug rdzus ses gdungs kyang thugs rje'i phyag brkyang pas skal ba dang 'thun bar rjes su 'dzini nga ra mdzod nga//spyir lung bstan pa' mdo ste stag rna'i rgyu skar las yon tan du ma dang ldan pa dang/ rtsom pa

pochanapo nyid dang/ lus brdzes nas mthorasi su skye ba bzhes pa//lung bstan 'phags pakhyams pa dang mjal bar bzhad pa'i srid pa dang chos kyi spyod pa bla lhag pa mnga' ba/ chags sdang la sogs pa thams cad niny+tsa/

chung bar gyur ba'i skyes bu de'i bsngags pa sbyo ban sus nug/mdor bsdun/'jig rtamachis kyimakhyen pa chazhing bzas/gser gyi sa gzhi dang 'dra ba la/dam pa'ilha chos phun sum tshogs pa mkhas pa dang/ btsun pa/

dang zhi ba dang/ dul ba dang/ man pa dang/ des pa dang/ bden bar sgrub/g.yo med pa// drang po'i reng bzhin can// bsgrub pa la snying por mdzad pa'arang ga bsams kyi ljon shing le 'dab rgyas pa g.yu'i mnul dang mtshungs par

'khrungs pa las/tshe 'di dang/ gzhan dang/ gnas skabs dang/ mthar thug pa'i dag ba'i dog phun sum tshogs pa'i ma tog dang 'bras bu yongs su rgyu ba'i rnam dag smon pa dodapagadang gzhan la phan pa'i pha rol tu phye

a@#// byanar sa cung zad kyang de med pa ma yin// rig pa'i gnas lnga la thog ba med pa'amkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i de9la gyisamadzes pa'i bcu ta chen po shAn ta dkar 'og pa tu'i zhal snga nas dang/ mkhas

ba chen po skyes bu dam pa 'dul ba'adzin pa yang mchog tu gyurang bani ta chen po A r+ya akar gu pa ta dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa 'jam dpal dang 'drab grags pa sbyobs ba'ishes rab can rnams kyi mchog nga ni chen po

shAkyarak+Sha ta dang/ pan chen mo ba'i A ka ra shAn tel sogs ba rnams la rgyadape lnga dang/ gzhan yang yul dbus ma ga d+hazhes bya ba de bzhin gshags pa'i rkyen mang du bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyasapa'i skye bo dkon mchog

gsum la dadang sa khul gang ba'i ma ga d+ha'i yul smad na/ rgyal la byang chub sems dpa' de wa pA la samadzad pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po bstan pa'i mig tu gyur pa bra klu ma sha lan yang mkhas pa'i spyi bomang du zin kyang

rakI ta de )nga dang sgra dang/ snyan dngags dang/ lags par sbyar ba'i skad kyi lugs la mkhas pa'i nga sI tachen po subu titsan+d+radang/ mngon pa la ma yas pa a tatsan dra la sogs pa rnams la rgya dpe gnyis la legs par

nyanazing gus pas thad du bstan nas don dang tshig ma lus par rtogs pa'i bshad pa zhus nas/shin tu dka' lta'i gnas rnams la na phye zhing gas par dpyad pas don dgrol ba'i thabs zhus te/'gyur gyi yan lag

rgya gar gyisang+keta dang/ 'phral skadaganyis/bod kyi chos skad dang 'dra la skad gnyis te/bzhi la dbang 'byor pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba thob mod kyis kyang/spyir mdo sdel don gyi gnas mang bas tshogadon phal cher bsnyengs

shing lhag par yang ang 'di don du ma tshig zur rnams kyis ngag gcig du 'brel bar ston pa ni tshig mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis de nagasal bamadzod nga/snyan dngags kyi dbang phyur//'gran gyi de nad pa rnams kyi mdzad pa'i rnam pa

pa'i phyir na/spyangs pa zhan ba rnams la sla ba ma yin la khyad par du rang gzhung nyung bsadon du ma ston pa'i mdun rol du ma bu rnams na spyir sor bsgyur bar mngon yang blo'i nirocan rnams kyis de nyid la don du res nus la//

byebragatugagal btab na ni donacig ston pa 'khrul ba'aphur dang/ tshig khritsam pas brjodopa de tsam du bsgyur bar sngags pa'i yang phyir da mdo na bod kyi den thun mong ba brda tha dad pa'i byed po ma mas par byas nas//sngon

gyi spur ba Da khas do nag kyi bkas bcud la sogs pa'i lugs dang yang na de'aga' bar byang phyogs pa tshab kyi rgyud du skyes pa'i dug slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshanagyi ba dam pa'i tshor 'dus pas rgya gar gyi rgyal po

thun sum tshogab pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbang phyug gzhan bas ches mtho bo dang ldan ng mA ba la'i ming la/theg pa chos pa'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos dran pa bar gzhag pa zhes bya babs shing 'gyur ba 'phro yongs su tshogrwa
par byas nas bsgyur ba'o// brgyad kyis rig la dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhing bu gcig pa zhes bya ba rab tu grags shing skye dgu rnams glegs pa yang/ 'jig rten nga nase nga la phan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi ge

brjod nga de dag rnams kyi gshis yin pa'i phyir te/skyes bu dasan semtshan la bu gcig pa la bzhan du dgos pas ga sa gcig pa'o// desanathugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mtshon no// chos la gnag pa rnams shes rab
so gas pa'i spyi'i bsdu ba dang mos pa dang nges pa dang/ mngon du rtogs shing shes nas rang dang nyan

ka nyon mongs pa dang/ shes bya sgrib pa'i mun pa 'joms pa'i 'od mdzad pa 'phyirataM/ des nirayAs rab chen po dang ldan pa dang/ bdag gzhan gyi ngon phun sumatshegs pa bstan to// dam pa'i skye bo des grogs mdzod nu

dag slong tshul khran rgyal mtshon nyid kyis dgongor byas so// de lta na dang po'i gzhi 'gyur dang/ zhu chen dang tshig ngen gyi 'bul dpyang da dang zhu chung dang yang 'brel dpyad pa dang/ lngas zhugs
shing gags du gtan la phab pa'o////dam chos mdo sde rin chen theg pa kun gyigazhi dang rtsa ba bcud du gyur pa'i theg chenadranagazhag 'di// legs bsgyur dngas dang grogs byed thams
cang dang ni nam mkha' mthas gtugs 'gro kun dag ba dri mang kya// srid na bde sbyin skyabs ga nas rdzogs nga byang chub 'bras ldan ba'i gnas skabs ljon shinga'i 'dab phun tshogs shog/

ra rang ngor tshe 'di brjes nas sangs rgyas zhing dag skye zhing 'khor tshogazhan la phan pa 'ba' zhig byed par shog/ bam po'i grangs su nem bcad do// gzhung tshad na stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu rgyudang rang
la bzhugs so// yige'i brda sngon gyi rnying pa dang mi 'dra ba cung zad snang/ dran pa nye bar gzhagarablo ka sum brgya labam por bcad na brgya nyi shu'o//
